original: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: su bi ni shva da sam pu ta t'i k'a n'a ma /
analyzed: su bi ni shva da sam pu ta t'i k'a n'a ma /
translated: Subhinna-sandhi-pundarika-tika-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rab tu gsal ba'i kha sbyor gyi rgya cher 'grel pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: rab tu gsal ba'i kha sbyor gyi rgya cher 'grel pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The commentary on the extensive version of the clear vajra-yoga

original: rje btsun spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rje btsun spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the venerable Avalokitesvara.

original: gang gi zhabs dran kho na yis //
analyzed: gang gi zhabs dran kho na yis //
translated: By merely remembering his feet,

original: 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par 'gyur //🔽de phyir bla ma dam pa yum //
analyzed: 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par 'gyur // de phyir bla ma dam pa yum //
translated: Samsara becomes nirvana.🔽Therefore, I constantly pay homage

original: bdag ni rtag par phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bdag ni rtag par phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: To the holy guru, the mother.

original: gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga drug bdag / mkha' 'gro ma yi rang bzhin te //
analyzed: gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga drug bdag / mkha' 'gro ma yi rang bzhin te //
translated: One, two, three, four, five, six, I am the nature of the dakinis.

original: de ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i mtshan //
analyzed: de ni dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i mtshan //
translated: That is the name of Hevajra.

original: tshig gi me tog kho bos mchod //
analyzed: tshig gi me tog kho bos mchod //
translated: I offer the flower of words.

original: bag tsam yongs gyur 'di ltar chags can nyams su myong ba gang //
analyzed: bag tsam yongs gyur 'di ltar chags can nyams su myong ba gang //
translated: This slight transformation, whatever experience the passionate one has,

original: mkha' mnyam ro mnyam de ni bsgoms pas ji zhig ltar te 'byung //
analyzed: mkha' mnyam ro mnyam de ni bsgoms pas ji zhig ltar te 'byung //
translated: That equal taste equal to space arises somehow through meditation.

original: 'di ni bla ma dam pa'i zhabs kyi rgyud pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid las //
analyzed: 'di ni bla ma dam pa'i zhabs kyi rgyud pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid las //
translated: This is from the greatness of the lineage of the feet of the holy guru.

original: grub pa'i dgyes rdor rgyud ni shin tu dag par bdag gis dbye //🔽dgyes pa'i rdo rje yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin 'di ni rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba bstan pa'i sgo nas 'gro ba'i don 'grub par bya ba'i phyir /🔽theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags la 'jug par bya ste /
analyzed: grub pa'i dgyes rdor rgyud ni shin tu dag par bdag gis dbye // dgyes pa'i rdo rje yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin 'di ni rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba bstan pa'i sgo nas 'gro ba'i don 'grub par bya ba'i phyir / theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags la 'jug par bya ste /
translated: I have thoroughly analyzed the Tantra of Heruka's Accomplishment.

original: 'di @2a * //🔽skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: 'di @2a * // skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: This Heruka, the nature of perfect enlightenment, is to be entered into the mantra of the Great Vehicle in order to accomplish the purpose of beings by means of teaching the expression and the expressed.

original: padma'i lte ba la yi ge a'a'o zhes pa la thug pas phyag bcu drug pa la sogs pa'i he ru ka'i rnam par dag pa'i zung 'jug bstan par bya bas de nyid la 'jug par bya ste /
analyzed: padma'i lte ba la yi ge a'a'o zhes pa la thug pas phyag bcu drug pa la sogs pa'i he ru ka'i rnam par dag pa'i zung 'jug bstan par bya bas de nyid la 'jug par bya ste /
translated: This is to be entered by teaching the union that is the purity of Heruka with sixteen faces and so forth, from Thus by me up to the letter A in the center of the lotus.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa ni /
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa ni /
translated: The literal meaning is

original: 'di skad bdag gis la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis la sogs pa'o //
translated: Thus by me and so forth.

original: sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa ni /
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa ni /
translated: The non-literal meaning is

original: gang zhig spyan ma la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang zhig spyan ma la sogs pa ste /
translated: whatever is Locanā and so forth.

original: dbyangs yig yang dag par sbyar ba las 'dus pa can dang / 'dus pa can ma yin pa'i gzhom du med pa'o //
analyzed: dbyangs yig yang dag par sbyar ba las 'dus pa can dang / 'dus pa can ma yin pa'i gzhom du med pa'o //
translated: The vowels are applied perfectly, and so they are “invincible” whether or not they are combined.

original: de rnam par gtan la dbab par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de rnam par gtan la dbab par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to determine that,

original: gsang sngags kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ste /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ste /
translated: one should enter into the way of mantra.

original: sngags kyi sgra ni dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi rang bzhin gyi yi ge gsum pho dang mo dang ma ning gi ngo bo yi ge aa la sogs pa dbyangs yig bcu drug rnams dang yi ge ka la sogs pa'i gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhi rnams te /
analyzed: sngags kyi sgra ni dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi rang bzhin gyi yi ge gsum pho dang mo dang ma ning gi ngo bo yi ge aa la sogs pa dbyangs yig bcu drug rnams dang yi ge ka la sogs pa'i gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhi rnams te /
translated: The term “mantra” refers to the three syllables that are the nature of vowels and consonants, which are the essence of male, female, and neuter. The sixteen vowels, beginning with “a,” and the thirty-four consonants, beginning with “ka,”

original: 'di gnyis kho na la a'a li k'a li zhes brjod do //
analyzed: 'di gnyis kho na la a'a li k'a li zhes brjod do //
translated: are called “ālikāli.”

original: 'di dag re re bzhin yang thabs dang shes rab dbyer mi phyed pas rdo rje gsum dang / 'byung ba bzhi dang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'di dag re re bzhin yang thabs dang shes rab dbyer mi phyed pas rdo rje gsum dang / 'byung ba bzhi dang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Each of these is the indivisible union of method and prajñā, and so they are the three vajras, and the nature of the four elements and the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: thog ma kho nar kun nas snang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'gro ba'i rang bzhin brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i ngo bo ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid can /🔽bskyed @2b pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa tha mi dad pa'i sku rdo rje /
analyzed: thog ma kho nar kun nas snang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'gro ba'i rang bzhin brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i ngo bo ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid can / bskyed @2b pa'i rim pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa tha mi dad pa'i sku rdo rje /
translated: First, the nature of the world, which has the characteristic of being completely apparent, the nature of the essence of the stable and the moving, the condition of ignorance, the nature of the conventional truth,🔽the stage of development and the stage of completion, the body vajra,🔽🔽

original: rdo rje gsum dbyer mi phyed pa'i yi ge aom chos thams cad kyi bdag por bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum dbyer mi phyed pa'i yi ge aom chos thams cad kyi bdag por bstan par bya'o //
translated: First of all, one should understand the syllable OṀ, which is the lord of all phenomena, the syllable that is inseparable from the three vajras, the body vajra, which is the nature of the reality of the superficial, the essence of the animate and inanimate world, which has the characteristic of universal appearance, the condition of nescience, the stage of development and the stage of completion, which are not different.

original: 'di ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is this?

original: gsang sngags thams cad kyi tshig la /
analyzed: gsang sngags thams cad kyi tshig la /
translated: In the words of all the mantras,

original: dang por yi ge aom dang mthar sv'a h'a'o //
analyzed: dang por yi ge aom dang mthar sv'a h'a'o //
translated: at the beginning there is the syllable OṀ, and at the end there is SVĀHĀ.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis so //
translated: This is the meaning of the words.

original: yi ge aom gyi don nyid rnam par dbye bar bya ste //
analyzed: yi ge aom gyi don nyid rnam par dbye bar bya ste //
translated: The meaning of the syllable OṀ should be analyzed.

original: aa ni bdag med ma zhes bshad //🔽au yig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: aa ni bdag med ma zhes bshad // au yig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: A is explained as Nairātmyā,🔽U is the Vajraḍāka,

original: ma yig mi bskyod rdo rje ba //
analyzed: ma yig mi bskyod rdo rje ba //
translated: M is Akṣobhya-vajra,

original: aom ni rdo rje gsum zhes bshad //
analyzed: aom ni rdo rje gsum zhes bshad //
translated: and OṀ is explained as the three vajras.

original: yi ge aa ni gsung zhes bshad //
analyzed: yi ge aa ni gsung zhes bshad //
translated: The syllable A is explained as speech,

original: yi ge au ni sku ru brjod //
analyzed: yi ge au ni sku ru brjod //
translated: The letter o is said to be the body.

original: ma yig thugs kyi rdo rje ste //
analyzed: ma yig thugs kyi rdo rje ste //
translated: The letter ma is the vajra mind.

original: rdor gsum gcig pa'i rang bzhin aom //
analyzed: rdor gsum gcig pa'i rang bzhin aom //
translated: The nature of the unity of the three vajras is oṃ.

original: yi ge'i dang por gyur ba'i phyir //
analyzed: yi ge'i dang por gyur ba'i phyir //
translated: Because it is the first of the letters,

original: yi ge'i gtso bo zhes su bshad //
analyzed: yi ge'i gtso bo zhes su bshad //
translated: it is explained to be the chief of the letters.

original: de phyir a'a li k'a li gnyis //
analyzed: de phyir a'a li k'a li gnyis //
translated: Therefore, the two, ālikāli,

original: thabs dang shes rab zhes byar bshad //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab zhes byar bshad //
translated: are explained to be method and wisdom.

original: dbyangs yig bco lnga aa yig sogs //
analyzed: dbyangs yig bco lnga aa yig sogs //
translated: The fifteen vowels, beginning with a,

original: shes rab tu ni rab tu grags //
analyzed: shes rab tu ni rab tu grags //
translated: are renowned as wisdom.🔽That which is the five sense organs,

original: gang zhig dbang po lnga rnams dang // yul dang shes pa lnga yang ste //
analyzed: gang zhig dbang po lnga rnams dang // yul dang shes pa lnga yang ste //
translated: the five objects, and the five consciousnesses,

original: rdor gsum mi phyed tha dad phyir //
analyzed: rdor gsum mi phyed tha dad phyir //
translated: because the three vajras are indivisible,

original: aom ni rdo rje gsum zhes bshad //
analyzed: aom ni rdo rje gsum zhes bshad //
translated: oṃ is explained to be the three vajras.

original: ka yi sde tshan lnga lngar bshad //
analyzed: ka yi sde tshan lnga lngar bshad //
translated: The five groups of ka are explained to be

original: rtag pa la sogs de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: rtag pa la sogs de bzhin gshegs //
translated: the tathāgatas, Akṣobhya, and so on.

original: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye bas de //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye bas de //
translated: They are divided into twenty-five,

original: re re rtag pa la sogs te //
analyzed: re re rtag pa la sogs te //
translated: each one of which is Akṣobhya, and so on.

original: dbang po la sogs cha las na //
analyzed: dbang po la sogs cha las na //
translated: From the aspect of the sense organs and so on,

original: de yang rnam pa bco lngar bshad //
analyzed: de yang rnam pa bco lngar bshad //
translated: they are also explained to be fifteen.

original: yar la nas wa yi mthar //
analyzed: yar la nas wa yi mthar //
translated: From ya up to va,

original: rlung dang me dang sa dang chu //
analyzed: rlung dang me dang sa dang chu //
translated: wind, fire, earth, and water🔽are the four elements.

original: re re'ang bzhi yi bdag nyid phyir //
analyzed: re re'ang bzhi yi bdag nyid phyir //
translated: Each one has the nature of four.

original: dbyangs ni bcu drug stong pa nyid //
analyzed: dbyangs ni bcu drug stong pa nyid //
translated: The sixteen vowels are emptiness.

original: sha sha sa rnams sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: sha sha sa rnams sku gsung thugs //
translated: The consonants ka, śa, sa are body, speech, and mind.

original: yi ge ha ni srid gsum gnas //🔽yi ge ksha yis k'a li bsdus //
analyzed: yi ge ha ni srid gsum gnas // yi ge ksha yis k'a li bsdus //
translated: The letter ha is the abode of the three existences.🔽The letter kṣa gathers the kālī.

original: yi ge a'as ni a'a li bsdus //
analyzed: yi ge a'as ni a'a li bsdus //
translated: The letter a gathers the ālī.

original: ksha yig mi phyed rtogs pa las //
analyzed: ksha yig mi phyed rtogs pa las //
translated: From the realization of the indivisible letter kṣa,

original: gnyi ga bsdus pa rab tu bshad //
analyzed: gnyi ga bsdus pa rab tu bshad //
translated: both are gathered, it is explained.🔽The lord of the dakinis Nairātmya,

original: bdag med mkha' 'gro ma yi bdag / mkha' 'gro ma yi dkyil 'khor gnas //
analyzed: bdag med mkha' 'gro ma yi bdag / mkha' 'gro ma yi dkyil 'khor gnas //
translated: the abode of the maṇḍala of dakinis,

original: de bas rdor sogs mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: de bas rdor sogs mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: therefore, the dakini of the vajra and so on

original: bdag med ma dang dbyer med son //
analyzed: bdag med ma dang dbyer med son //
translated: is inseparable from Nairātmya.

original: bdag med ma ni thabs bdag pas //
analyzed: bdag med ma ni thabs bdag pas //
translated: Since Nairātmya is the lord of methods,

original: de phyir de yang thabs dang 'dra //
analyzed: de phyir de yang thabs dang 'dra //
translated: therefore, she is also like a method.

original: de phyir dbyer med dkyil 'khor bas //
analyzed: de phyir dbyer med dkyil 'khor bas //
translated: Therefore, the indivisible maṇḍala

original: 'dir ni gnyi ga the tshom med //
analyzed: 'dir ni gnyi ga the tshom med //
translated: is both of them without doubt.

original: rnam snang la sogs kyang de ltar //
analyzed: rnam snang la sogs kyang de ltar //
translated: Also, Vairocana and so on🔽are also the lords of Akṣobhya.

original: de yang mi bskyod pa yi bdag / de phyir mi bskyod pa lta bur //
analyzed: de yang mi bskyod pa yi bdag / de phyir mi bskyod pa lta bur //
translated: Therefore, like Akṣobhya,

original: de kun dkyil 'khor gtso bo yin //
analyzed: de kun dkyil 'khor gtso bo yin //
translated: all of them are the lords of the maṇḍala.

original: mkha' 'gro mas ni mi bskyod bdag / de phyir shes rab bdag nyid de //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro mas ni mi bskyod bdag / de phyir shes rab bdag nyid de //
translated: and therefore the nature of wisdom.

original: gnyis po gnyis kar @3a * //
analyzed: gnyis po gnyis kar @3a * //
translated: The two are both

original: dbyer med pas //
analyzed: dbyer med pas //
translated: indivisible.

original: dbyer med dkyil 'khor gnyis yin no //
analyzed: dbyer med dkyil 'khor gnyis yin no //
translated: The indivisible is the two mandalas.

original: de nas yi ge re re yis //
analyzed: de nas yi ge re re yis //
translated: Then, by each syllable,

original: dkyil 'khor re rer 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor re rer 'gyur ba yin //
translated: there is each mandala.

original: de lta bas na 'di kun nyid //🔽n'a da'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor yin //
analyzed: de lta bas na 'di kun nyid // n'a da'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor yin //
translated: Therefore, all of this🔽is the mandala by the method of nāda.

original: a'a li k'a li'i dkyil 'khor zhes //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li'i dkyil 'khor zhes //
translated: The mandala of ālikāli

original: mi phyed pa las kha sbyor yin //
analyzed: mi phyed pa las kha sbyor yin //
translated: is the union from the indivisible.

original: gang phyir a'a li k'a li yi //
analyzed: gang phyir a'a li k'a li yi //
translated: Because the nature of ālikāli

original: rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan //
analyzed: rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan //
translated: is taught as the mandala,

original: yi ge re re nyid kyis kyang //
analyzed: yi ge re re nyid kyis kyang //
translated: by each syllable

original: gang zhig dkyil 'khor bstan pas na //
analyzed: gang zhig dkyil 'khor bstan pas na //
translated: the mandala is taught.

original: de phyir yi ge gcig dang ni //
analyzed: de phyir yi ge gcig dang ni //
translated: Therefore, the single syllable

original: du ma'ang tha dad med pa nyid //
analyzed: du ma'ang tha dad med pa nyid //
translated: and the many are also not different.🔽Therefore, here whatever is called

original: de bas 'di ru gang 'ga' zhig / yi ge'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba //
analyzed: de bas 'di ru gang 'ga' zhig / yi ge'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba //
translated: the mandala of syllables

original: yi ge'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyis //
analyzed: yi ge'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyis //
translated: by that very mandala of syllables

original: srid gsum rab tu 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: srid gsum rab tu 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: the three existences are accomplished.

original: srid gsum mi phyed par rtogs pa //
analyzed: srid gsum mi phyed par rtogs pa //
translated: The realization of the inseparability of the three existences

original: sngags kyi de nyid zhes su bshad //
analyzed: sngags kyi de nyid zhes su bshad //
translated: Is explained as the reality of mantra.

original: de ltar sku dang gsung dang thugs //
analyzed: de ltar sku dang gsung dang thugs //
translated: Thus, body, speech, and mind

original: n'a da gcig tu mngon par brjod //
analyzed: n'a da gcig tu mngon par brjod //
translated: Are expressed as a single nāda.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs 'di nyid //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs 'di nyid //
translated: This very body, speech, and mind

original: sku zhes bya bar yang dag gnas //
analyzed: sku zhes bya bar yang dag gnas //
translated: Are truly present as the body.

original: thugs gsung sku yi rang bzhin yang //
analyzed: thugs gsung sku yi rang bzhin yang //
translated: The nature of mind, speech, and body

original: thugs zhes bya bar nges par yin //
analyzed: thugs zhes bya bar nges par yin //
translated: Is ascertained as the mind.

original: thabs ni mtha' yas pa yi phyir //
analyzed: thabs ni mtha' yas pa yi phyir //
translated: Because the method is limitless,

original: shes rab kyang ni mtha' yas nyid //
analyzed: shes rab kyang ni mtha' yas nyid //
translated: Wisdom is also limitless.

original: srid gsum de rang bzhin shes na //
analyzed: srid gsum de rang bzhin shes na //
translated: If one knows the nature of the three existences,

original: skye ba 'di la 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: skye ba 'di la 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: One will be accomplished in this life.

original: de nyid la lar 'jig rten pas //
analyzed: de nyid la lar 'jig rten pas //
translated: In some places, the worldly

original: sgra don rab tu brtags pa gang //
analyzed: sgra don rab tu brtags pa gang //

original: de nyid don gyi brda nyid du //
analyzed: de nyid don gyi brda nyid du //
translated: That very meaning is the sign itself,

original: byang chub pha rol son pas gsungs //
analyzed: byang chub pha rol son pas gsungs //
translated: Spoken by the one who has gone to the perfection of enlightenment.

original: la lar don gyi brdar btags pa //
analyzed: la lar don gyi brdar btags pa //
translated: In some places, the sign of the meaning

original: dngos pos kyang ni rnam par bstan //
analyzed: dngos pos kyang ni rnam par bstan //
translated: Is also explained by entities.🔽Therefore, these entities and meanings

analyzed: de phyir dngos po don 'di dag / gang yang sgra yis nges pa yin //

analyzed: yang na sgra dang don 'di nyid //

analyzed: dngos po yis ni yongs su brtags //

analyzed: yang na dngos po dang ni brda //

analyzed: de ltar dngos po dang ni sgra //

analyzed: gnyi gar don dang tha dad med //

analyzed: gnyi gar don dang tha dad med //

analyzed: de phyir don dang sgra gnyis ni //

analyzed: dngos po nyid dang tha dad med //
translated: are not different from entities.

original: de bas sgra dang don gnyis kyang //
analyzed: de bas sgra dang don gnyis kyang //
translated: Thus, sound and meaning

original: dngos po nyid dang tha dad med //
analyzed: dngos po nyid dang tha dad med //
translated: are not different from entities.

original: de bzhin don dang dngos po gnyis //
analyzed: de bzhin don dang dngos po gnyis //
translated: Likewise, meaning and entities

original: sgra nyid las ni tha dad med //
analyzed: sgra nyid las ni tha dad med //
translated: are not different from sound.

original: de ltar dngos po dang ni don //
analyzed: de ltar dngos po dang ni don //
translated: Thus, entities and meaning

original: sgra nyid las ni tha dad med //
analyzed: sgra nyid las ni tha dad med //
translated: are not different from sound.

original: gang phyir de gsum dbyer med par //
analyzed: gang phyir de gsum dbyer med par //
translated: Because those three are inseparable,

original: lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa nyid //
analyzed: lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa nyid //
translated: there is forward and reverse.🔽The kindness of the sublime guru,

original: bla ma dam pa'i bka' drin dang // dad dang shes rab rnon po ni //
analyzed: bla ma dam pa'i bka' drin dang // dad dang shes rab rnon po ni //
translated: faith, and sharp wisdom

original: med par @3b dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud //
analyzed: med par @3b dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud //
translated: The tantra of Hevajra is not for those who delight in nonexistence.

original: don ni su yis rtogs par nus //
analyzed: don ni su yis rtogs par nus //
translated: Who can understand its meaning?

original: de bas ston pa nyid kyis su //
analyzed: de bas ston pa nyid kyis su //
translated: Therefore, the Teacher himself

original: 'di skad kyi ni tshig gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di skad kyi ni tshig gsungs so //
translated: spoke these words:

original: rgyud kun gyi ni tshul shes nas //
analyzed: rgyud kun gyi ni tshul shes nas //
translated: “Having understood the method of all tantras,

original: phyi nas dgyes pa'i rdo rje brtsam //
analyzed: phyi nas dgyes pa'i rdo rje brtsam //
translated: later compose the Hevajra Tantra.”

original: de yang thog ma nyid du rdo rje'i snying pos zhus nas //
analyzed: de yang thog ma nyid du rdo rje'i snying pos zhus nas //
translated: Moreover, at the very beginning Vajra Heart requested,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: and the Bhagavān replied:

original: he ni snying rje chen po ste //
analyzed: he ni snying rje chen po ste //
translated: “He is great compassion,

original: badzra'ang shes rab brjod par bya //
analyzed: badzra'ang shes rab brjod par bya //
translated: and vajra should be stated as wisdom.

original: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud //
translated: The tantra is the nature of method and wisdom.

original: de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon //
analyzed: de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon //
translated: Listen as I explain it.”

original: zhes pa'o // de la he ni snying rje chen po ste zhes pa ni //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // de la he ni snying rje chen po ste zhes pa ni //
translated: Regarding that, “He is great compassion” means

original: he'i sgras 'jig rten pas gang la snying rje chen po'i don brjod pa de srid du mi snang ngo //
analyzed: he'i sgras 'jig rten pas gang la snying rje chen po'i don brjod pa de srid du mi snang ngo //
translated: the term he does not appear to be the meaning of great compassion expressed by worldly people.

original: de lta bas na cha dang bcas pa dang / cha med pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po gnyis kho na skyes pa dang bud med kyi rang bzhin gyi yi ge ha dang yi ge ae'i n'a da gnyis kyi bdag nyid can gyi sgras snying rje chen po'i don bstan to //
analyzed: de lta bas na cha dang bcas pa dang / cha med pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po gnyis kho na skyes pa dang bud med kyi rang bzhin gyi yi ge ha dang yi ge ae'i n'a da gnyis kyi bdag nyid can gyi sgras snying rje chen po'i don bstan to //
translated: Thus, the meaning of great compassion is taught by the sound of the two syllables, the nature of which is the male and female, which have the nature of the male and female syllables, with the nature of having parts and being partless.

original: snying rje zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'i don la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'i don la 'jug pa'o //
translated: Compassion is the engagement for the sake of migrating beings.

original: de'i yang chen por gyur pa gang las she na /
analyzed: de'i yang chen por gyur pa gang las she na /
translated: And what is its greatness?

original: bdag med mas slar zin pa'i las so //
analyzed: bdag med mas slar zin pa'i las so //
translated: It is the activity of the one who is embraced by Nairātmya.

original: de lta ma yin na dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i lta ba des nyan thos rnams bzhin du nyi tshe bar gnas pas rab dman pas sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi snying rjer 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i lta ba des nyan thos rnams bzhin du nyi tshe bar gnas pas rab dman pas sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi snying rjer 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, by that view which has an object, like the śrāvakas, it would be a limited abiding, and therefore it would be a compassion whose nature is generosity and so on, which is inferior.

original: de bas na shes rab kyis zin pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa ni snying rje chen po'i don du bstan pas na snying rje chen po'i don to //
analyzed: de bas na shes rab kyis zin pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa ni snying rje chen po'i don du bstan pas na snying rje chen po'i don to //
translated: Therefore, generosity and so on, which are embraced by wisdom, are taught to be the meaning of great compassion, and thus they are the meaning of great compassion.

original: badzra'ang shes rab brjod par bya //
analyzed: badzra'ang shes rab brjod par bya //
translated: Vajra also should be understood as wisdom.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: From what is this?

original: badzra'i sgras kyang shes rab bstan pa gang las yin //
analyzed: badzra'i sgras kyang shes rab bstan pa gang las yin //
translated: The term vajra also indicates wisdom.

original: de yang shes rab ces bya don gang las bstan ce na /
analyzed: de yang shes rab ces bya don gang las bstan ce na /
translated: And what is the meaning of wisdom?

original: mi phyed rdo rje zhes bshad ces bya ba'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: mi phyed rdo rje zhes bshad ces bya ba'i tshig gis so //
translated: It is explained as the indivisible vajra.

original: ji ltar rdo rje cis kyang phyed par mi nus pa de bzhin du shes rab gsal ba'i rab kyi ye shes 'di yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa tha mi dad pa 'di ni dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje zhes brjod do //
analyzed: ji ltar rdo rje cis kyang phyed par mi nus pa de bzhin du shes rab gsal ba'i rab kyi ye shes 'di yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa tha mi dad pa 'di ni dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje zhes brjod do //
translated: Just as a vajra cannot be split by anything, so also this wisdom of clear light is called a vajra because it is indivisible, since it is not different from the conventional and the ultimate.

original: de bzhin nyid du bla ma'i dus tshigs kyi rim pa las rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du bla ma'i dus tshigs kyi rim pa las rtogs par bya ste /
translated: This should be understood from the stages of the guru's time.

original: theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags mngon par gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i rim pa nyid la 'jug par bya ste /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags mngon par gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i rim pa nyid la 'jug par bya ste /
translated: In order to clarify the mantra of the Great Vehicle, one should enter into the stages of the guru.

original: yi ge aa ni thugs zhes bshad //
analyzed: yi ge aa ni thugs zhes bshad //
translated: The letter A is explained as mind.

original: yi ge thams cad gcig tu bsdoms //
analyzed: yi ge thams cad gcig tu bsdoms //
translated: All letters are gathered into one.

original: yi ge ai ni gsung zhes bshad //
analyzed: yi ge ai ni gsung zhes bshad //
translated: The letter I is explained as speech.

original: yi ge au ni sku yin no //
analyzed: yi ge au ni sku yin no //
translated: The letter u is the body.

original: rdor gsum rdo rje'i rnal 'byor 'khrungs //
analyzed: rdor gsum rdo rje'i rnal 'byor 'khrungs //
translated: The three vajras are born from the vajra yoga.

original: de ltar yi ge gsum zhes bya //
analyzed: de ltar yi ge gsum zhes bya //
translated: Thus, these are called the three letters.

original: ae yig thugs dang gsung @4a * //
analyzed: ae yig thugs dang gsung @4a * //
translated: The letter e is the way of mind and speech,

original: gi tshul // sku dang thugs su bam bya ste //
analyzed: gi tshul // sku dang thugs su bam bya ste //
translated: and vaṃ is taken to be body and mind.

original: ae ni shes rab bam ni thabs //
analyzed: ae ni shes rab bam ni thabs //
translated: E is wisdom, vaṃ is method,

original: gang phyir de ltar rdor gsum nyid //
analyzed: gang phyir de ltar rdor gsum nyid //
translated: because in this way the three vajras

original: rdo rje gsum ni gnyis kyis bskyed //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni gnyis kyis bskyed //
translated: are generated by the two.

original: rnam par phye bas sa dang me //🔽'di gnyis rdo rje gsum gyi ni //
analyzed: rnam par phye bas sa dang me // 'di gnyis rdo rje gsum gyi ni //
translated: The division is earth and fire.🔽These two are generated

original: sngon du sbyar bas bskyed pa yin //
analyzed: sngon du sbyar bas bskyed pa yin //
translated: by the prior application of the three vajras.

original: sku dang gsung gi sngon du ni //
analyzed: sku dang gsung gi sngon du ni //
translated: Prior to body and speech,

original: thugs ni sbyar bas rlung dang chu //
analyzed: thugs ni sbyar bas rlung dang chu //
translated: mind is applied, generating wind and water.

original: gnyis nyid rdo rje gsum du 'gyur //
analyzed: gnyis nyid rdo rje gsum du 'gyur //
translated: The two become the three vajras.

original: 'byung bzhi nam mkha' dang bsres pa //
analyzed: 'byung bzhi nam mkha' dang bsres pa //
translated: The four elements mixed with space

original: ye shes lnga zhes rab tu bshad //
analyzed: ye shes lnga zhes rab tu bshad //
translated: are explained to be the five gnoses.

original: lnga lnga gcig la'ang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: lnga lnga gcig la'ang yang dag ldan //
translated: Five times five are complete in one.

original: drug lnga rigs gsum shes par bya //🔽rigs gcig grangs ni med pa can //
analyzed: drug lnga rigs gsum shes par bya // rigs gcig grangs ni med pa can //
translated: Six times five are known to be the three families.🔽One family is the one with no number.

original: grangs med rigs gcig dang ni gsum //
analyzed: grangs med rigs gcig dang ni gsum //
translated: The three families are the one with no number.

original: lnga dang drug pa nyid dang ni //
analyzed: lnga dang drug pa nyid dang ni //
translated: The fifth and sixth are the same,

original: 'di ni bco lnga'i bdag nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di ni bco lnga'i bdag nyid 'gyur //
translated: and this is the nature of the fifteenth.🔽The ninth is the nature of the six,

original: drug po dor bas dgu yi bdag / gnyis po 'di ni gnyis med nyid //
analyzed: drug po dor bas dgu yi bdag / gnyis po 'di ni gnyis med nyid //
translated: and these two are nonduality.

original: gnyis su snang ba rtog pa yin //🔽bskyed bya skyed byed yod ma yin //
analyzed: gnyis su snang ba rtog pa yin // bskyed bya skyed byed yod ma yin //
translated: The appearance of duality is conceptual.🔽There is no produced and producer.

original: skyed byed la yang bskyed bya med //
analyzed: skyed byed la yang bskyed bya med //
translated: There is no produced in the producer.

original: 'di dag thams cad skye ba med //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad skye ba med //
translated: All of these are unproduced.

original: mtshan ma med cing bdag med can //
analyzed: mtshan ma med cing bdag med can //
translated: They are signless and without self.

original: chos de med pas sems kyang med //
analyzed: chos de med pas sems kyang med //
translated: Since those phenomena do not exist, the mind also does not exist.

original: snang ba med cing bdag med pa //
analyzed: snang ba med cing bdag med pa //
translated: It is without appearance and without self.

original: 'di ni sangs rgyas byang chub mtshungs //
analyzed: 'di ni sangs rgyas byang chub mtshungs //
translated: This is the same as the enlightenment of the buddhas.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha' 'dra //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha' 'dra //
translated: It is inconceivable and like space.

original: de ltar gsung sngags theg chen 'di //
analyzed: de ltar gsung sngags theg chen 'di //
translated: Thus, this mantra vehicle of the Great Vehicle

original: rim pa shin tu rnyed par dka' //
analyzed: rim pa shin tu rnyed par dka' //
translated: is a stage that is very difficult to attain.

original: bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis //
translated: Through the kindness of the guru’s feet,

original: gang tshe dgyes rdor khong du chud //🔽gzhan du bskal pa bye ba ni //
analyzed: gang tshe dgyes rdor khong du chud // gzhan du bskal pa bye ba ni //
translated: when one understands Hevajra,🔽even in a hundred quintillions of eons elsewhere,

original: brgyas kyang de nyid rtogs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: brgyas kyang de nyid rtogs mi 'gyur //
translated: one will not understand suchness.

original: de nyid ye shes bral gyur na //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes bral gyur na //
translated: If one is separated from the wisdom of suchness,

original: mchog gi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
analyzed: mchog gi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
translated: One will not attain the supreme attainment.

original: de bas gang 'di dran pa nyams pa'i 'jigs pa yis //
analyzed: de bas gang 'di dran pa nyams pa'i 'jigs pa yis //
translated: Therefore,

original: bdag gi bla ma rnams kyi rim pa'i don cung zad //
analyzed: bdag gi bla ma rnams kyi rim pa'i don cung zad //
translated: having obtained this meaning of the stages of my gurus🔽with effort out of fear of the degeneration of mindfulness,

original: 'bad pas thob nas shin tu phul du byung bar bsams //
analyzed: 'bad pas thob nas shin tu phul du byung bar bsams //
translated: I have thought about it very well.

original: rnam par bsgoms nas ston pa rnams la 'di yis mchod //
analyzed: rnam par bsgoms nas ston pa rnams la 'di yis mchod //
translated: Having meditated on it, I worship the teachers with this.

original: 'di las ma lus 'gro ba'i don byed gter du gyur pa ni //
analyzed: 'di las ma lus 'gro ba'i don byed gter du gyur pa ni //
translated: This is the treasure that benefits the entire world.

original: yang dag pa bdag nyid srid gsum bzlog pa rdo rje'i snying po ste //
analyzed: yang dag pa bdag nyid srid gsum bzlog pa rdo rje'i snying po ste //
translated: The essence of the vajra is the true nature that turns away the three existences.

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud kyi che ba so sor snang ba'i yid //
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud kyi che ba so sor snang ba'i yid //
translated: The mind that sees the greatness of the Hevajra Tantra individually

original: gti mug rab rib ces bya 'di lta'i go skabs ga la yod //
analyzed: gti mug rab rib ces bya 'di lta'i go skabs ga la yod //
translated: has no opportunity for what is called the darkness of delusion.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i rang bzhin brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i ngo bo dag 'gro ba 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhir gyur pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i rang bzhin brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i ngo bo dag 'gro ba 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhir gyur pa gsungs pa /
translated: The nature of the object of attainment and the means of attainment, the nature of the expressed and the expression, the characteristic of engaging the world, the nidāna of all tantras, is stated:

original: 'di @4b skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di @4b skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus have I heard at one time the Blessed One was dwelling in the bhaga of the Vajra Queen, the body, speech, and mind of all Tathagatas.

original: 'di nyid ma lus pa rtogs par byed pa'i rang bzhin rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu bsgrub par bya ba ni spyi'i don to //
analyzed: 'di nyid ma lus pa rtogs par byed pa'i rang bzhin rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu bsgrub par bya ba ni spyi'i don to //
translated: The general meaning is that the cause of omniscience, which is the perfect enlightenment that is the nature of the realization of all this without exception, is to be accomplished.

original: 'bras bu gyur pa phyag bcu drug pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bdag nyid can 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa mngon par bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu gyur pa phyag bcu drug pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bdag nyid can 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa mngon par bstan par bya ste /
translated: The result is the sixteen-fold homage and so forth, which is the nature of the thirty-seven factors of enlightenment. This is to be revealed by the words thus have I heard and so forth.

original: de la yi ge ae la sogs pa bzhis //
analyzed: de la yi ge ae la sogs pa bzhis //
translated: Therein, by the four syllables such as E and so forth,

original: dang por zhabs ni bzhi ba nyid //
analyzed: dang por zhabs ni bzhi ba nyid //
translated: first, the four feet.

original: yi ge sru sogs brgyad kyis kyang //
analyzed: yi ge sru sogs brgyad kyis kyang //
translated: By the eight syllables such as SRU and so forth,

original: zhal brgyad de yi rjes thogs su //
analyzed: zhal brgyad de yi rjes thogs su //
translated: the eight faces, after that.

original: bha sogs bcu drug gis kyang ni //
analyzed: bha sogs bcu drug gis kyang ni //
translated: By the sixteen syllables such as BHA and so forth,

original: phyag ni bcu drug brgyan pa nyid //
analyzed: phyag ni bcu drug brgyan pa nyid //
translated: He is adorned with sixteen hands.

original: yi ge yo sogs brgyad kyis kyang //
analyzed: yi ge yo sogs brgyad kyis kyang //
translated: He is endowed with eight syllables such as yo,

original: spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhis phyug / yi ger zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhis phyug / yi ger zhes bya ba ni //
translated: and with twenty-four eyes.

original: dgyes rdor sum cu rtsa drug ldan //
analyzed: dgyes rdor sum cu rtsa drug ldan //
translated: He is endowed with the thirty-six of the hero Heruka,

original: ji ltar bde mchog dpa' mo dpa' //
analyzed: ji ltar bde mchog dpa' mo dpa' //
translated: just as the hero is the hero of the heroines.

original: sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dus pa ste //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dus pa ste //
translated: He is endowed with the thirty-two assemblies,

original: de ltar gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: de ltar gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: and thus, by the union of nonduality,

original: kha sbyar bas ni rnam par gnas //
analyzed: kha sbyar bas ni rnam par gnas //
translated: he is present in the embrace.

original: dpa' bo bdag med ma la chags //
analyzed: dpa' bo bdag med ma la chags //
translated: The hero is attached to Nairātmyā,

original: 'gro ba'i bla ma 'di la 'dud //🔽de lta bas na rgyud kun gyi //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bla ma 'di la 'dud // de lta bas na rgyud kun gyi //
translated: and I bow to this guru of beings.🔽Therefore, this is the nidāna

original: 'di ni gleng gzhi'i tshig yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni gleng gzhi'i tshig yin no //
translated: of all the tantras.

original: rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'i sgra yis thams cad ni ma lus pa ste /
analyzed: rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'i sgra yis thams cad ni ma lus pa ste /
translated: The word nidāna of all the tantras means all without exception.

original: snod kyi 'jig rten pa'i sems can gyi rang bzhin brtan pa dang g-yo ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: snod kyi 'jig rten pa'i sems can gyi rang bzhin brtan pa dang g-yo ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: They are the nature of the world of the vessel, the animate and inanimate, and so on.

original: de rnams kyi rgyud ni bye brag tu rtogs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rgyud ni bye brag tu rtogs par byed pa ste /
translated: Their tantra is that which causes specific understanding,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: which is omniscience.

original: de'i gleng gzhi ni dang po'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: de'i gleng gzhi ni dang po'i rgyu ste /
translated: The basis of that is the initial cause.

original: de lta bur gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan 'di yin no //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan 'di yin no //
translated: The reason for being such is this.

original: bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bya ba dang / spyod pa'i rgyud nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bya ba dang / spyod pa'i rgyud nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: The word “exists” indicates the nature of the Action and Performance Tantras.

original: ae wam ma ya'i yi ge bzhi ni re re'ang rdo rje gsum dang ldan pa sbas pa gnyi ga'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin de lta bas na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi ngo bo yin no //
analyzed: ae wam ma ya'i yi ge bzhi ni re re'ang rdo rje gsum dang ldan pa sbas pa gnyi ga'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin de lta bas na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi ngo bo yin no //
translated: The four syllables e, vaṃ, ma, ya, each endowed with the three vajras, are the nature of the two hidden maṇḍalas. Therefore, they are the nature of the twelve links of dependent origination.

original: re re'ang rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin po yin pas bzhi rnams 'byung ba bzhi'i bdag nyid yin pa des kyang stong pa nyid bcu drug gi rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: re re'ang rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin po yin pas bzhi rnams 'byung ba bzhi'i bdag nyid yin pa des kyang stong pa nyid bcu drug gi rang bzhin rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub pa yin no //
translated: Since each is the nature of the three vajras, the four are the nature of the four elements. By that, the nature of the sixteen emptinesses is accomplished as the complete enlightenment of omniscience.

original: yang na rgyud thams cad kyi sgras @5a * //
analyzed: yang na rgyud thams cad kyi sgras @5a * //
translated: Or, by the word “all tantras,”

original: ni rgyud bzhi ste /
analyzed: ni rgyud bzhi ste /
translated: the four tantras are meant.

original: de la bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud ni //
analyzed: de la bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud ni //
translated: The Action and Performance Tantras are explained as the

original: dgod par bshad do //
analyzed: dgod par bshad do //
translated: laughter.🔽The Yoga Tantra is indicated by the very words “he🔽dwelt.”🔽The Yoga Tantra is indicated by the words “he dwelt.”🔽The Yoga Tantra is indicated by the words “he dwelt.”

original: de la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i tshig nyid kyis mngon par gsal ba nyid do //🔽rnal 'byor gyi rgyud ni yang blta bar mngon par bstan to //

original: rnal 'byor gong na med par yang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gong na med par yang //
translated: and the yoga is unsurpassed.

original: gzhan ni 'bus zos snying po med //
analyzed: gzhan ni 'bus zos snying po med //
translated: The other is like a husk eaten by worms.

original: ces pa ste gnyis kyis gnyis sprad pa'i rgyud du yang nges pa'i don nyid yin no //🔽rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi gleng gzhi'i tshig gnyis gnyis sprad pa'i rgyud du yang nges pa'i don nyid yin no //
analyzed: ces pa ste gnyis kyis gnyis sprad pa'i rgyud du yang nges pa'i don nyid yin no // rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi gleng gzhi'i tshig gnyis gnyis sprad pa'i rgyud du yang nges pa'i don nyid yin no //
translated: Thus, in the Tantra of the Union of Two-by-Two, it is the definitive meaning itself.🔽In the Tantra of the Union of Two-by-Two, which is the nidana of the Yoga Tantra, it is the definitive meaning itself.

original: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi gleng gzhi'i tshig gnyis gnyis sprad pa'i rgyud dang mi 'dra ba med par mngon par gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi gleng gzhi'i tshig gnyis gnyis sprad pa'i rgyud dang mi 'dra ba med par mngon par gsal ba yin no //
translated: In the Yoga Tantra, the nidana is clearly not different from the Tantra of the Union of Two-by-Two.

original: gsang ba la sogs pa'i don dang gzhan ni 'bus zos zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gyi khongs su gtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: gsang ba la sogs pa'i don dang gzhan ni 'bus zos zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gyi khongs su gtogs pa yin te /
translated: The meaning of “secret” and so forth, and the meaning of “the other is like a husk eaten by worms” and so forth, are included in this.

original: 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ngag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gleng gzhi yin no //
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ngag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gleng gzhi yin no //
translated: The statement “thus have I heard” and so forth is the nidana of omniscience.

original: ji ltar 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus pa de bzhin du gnyis gnyis sprad pa zhes bya ba'i khongs su rgyud kun 'dus pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus pa de bzhin du gnyis gnyis sprad pa zhes bya ba'i khongs su rgyud kun 'dus pa yin no //
translated: Just as the perfection of wisdom includes all the perfections, so too all the tantras are included in the category of the two joined.

original: kun mkhyen gsum gyi rang bzhin dgyes pa'i rdo rje yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par byed pa'i nges pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: kun mkhyen gsum gyi rang bzhin dgyes pa'i rdo rje yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par byed pa'i nges pa gsungs pa /
translated: The nature of the three omnisciences is Hevajra, who is said to be the means of attaining perfect enlightenment.

original: yi ge ae ni sa ru bshad //
analyzed: yi ge ae ni sa ru bshad //
translated: The letter e is said to be the earth.

original: las kyi phyag rgya spyan ma ste //
analyzed: las kyi phyag rgya spyan ma ste //
translated: The karma consort is Locanā.

original: 'gro ba'i don la rab 'jug phyir //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don la rab 'jug phyir //
translated: In order to engage in the welfare of migrating beings,

original: 'di ni mi sogs rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: 'di ni mi sogs rang bzhin nyid //
translated: this is the nature of the non-human.

original: de ni snying rje che zhes bshad //
analyzed: de ni snying rje che zhes bshad //
translated: That is said to be great compassion.

original: thabs chen po yi rang bzhin can //
analyzed: thabs chen po yi rang bzhin can //
translated: The nature of great method

original: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs //
analyzed: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs //
translated: is the tathāgata family.

original: pad 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi pa //
analyzed: pad 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi pa //
translated: The lotus has sixty-four petals.

original: sprul par zhugs pa'i lha mo ni //
analyzed: sprul par zhugs pa'i lha mo ni //
translated: The goddess who enters emanation

original: kun @5b rdzob rnam pa'i tshul can te //
analyzed: kun @5b rdzob rnam pa'i tshul can te //
translated: has the mode of the relative.

original: phung po lnga ni gcig pa'i sku //
analyzed: phung po lnga ni gcig pa'i sku //
translated: The five aggregates are the single body.

original: sgyu ma chen mo zhes su bshad //
analyzed: sgyu ma chen mo zhes su bshad //
translated: Is explained as the Great Illusion.

original: bam yig chu ru rab tu bshad //
analyzed: bam yig chu ru rab tu bshad //
translated: The syllable Bam is fully explained as water.

original: chos kyi phyag rgya m'a ma k'i //
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya m'a ma k'i //
translated: The Dharma mudra is Mamaki.

original: a'a li k'a li'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: By the nature of Alikali,

original: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin can //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin can //
translated: She has the nature of the bodhicitta.

original: zla ba nyi ma gcig tshul gyis //
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma gcig tshul gyis //
translated: In the manner of one moon and one sun,

original: thabs dang shes rab sdom pa gcig / byams dang smon lam tshul can te /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab sdom pa gcig / byams dang smon lam tshul can te /
translated: Method and wisdom are one vow.

original: lha mo rdo rje'i rigs rjes 'gro //
analyzed: lha mo rdo rje'i rigs rjes 'gro //
translated: The goddess follows the Vajra family.

original: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lor ni //
analyzed: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lor ni //
translated: In the heart, the wheel of dharma,

original: chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad par zhugs //
analyzed: chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad par zhugs //
translated: Is the eight-petaled lotus.

original: yi ge ma ni me ru bshad //
analyzed: yi ge ma ni me ru bshad //
translated: The syllable Ma is explained as fire.

original: phyag rgya chen mo gos dkar mo //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen mo gos dkar mo //
translated: The great mudra is the white-clad one.

original: dga' ba stobs kyi rnal 'byor gyi //
analyzed: dga' ba stobs kyi rnal 'byor gyi //
translated: By the yoga of the power of joy,

original: lha mo padma'i rigs su byung //
analyzed: lha mo padma'i rigs su byung //
translated: The goddess arises in the Lotus family.

original: zla ba nyi ma yang dag sbyor //
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma yang dag sbyor //
translated: The union of the moon and sun

original: de yi myong ba'i tshul can te //
analyzed: de yi myong ba'i tshul can te //
translated: Is the manner of her experience.

original: mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo ru //
analyzed: mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo ru //
translated: In the throat, the wheel of enjoyment,

original: chu skyes bcu drug 'dab mar gnas //
analyzed: chu skyes bcu drug 'dab mar gnas //
translated: Is the sixteen-petaled lotus.

original: y'a yig rlung gi khams su 'gyur //
analyzed: y'a yig rlung gi khams su 'gyur //
translated: The syllable Ya is the element of wind.

original: dam tshig phyag rgya sgrol ma ste //
analyzed: dam tshig phyag rgya sgrol ma ste //
translated: The pledge seal is Tara.

original: btang snyong ye shes tshul can las //
analyzed: btang snyong ye shes tshul can las //
translated: From the method of the wisdom of equanimity,

original: de yang las kyi rigs rjes song //
analyzed: de yang las kyi rigs rjes song //
translated: The karma family is the follower.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa yis //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa yis //
translated: The assembly of the tathagatas

original: dogs pa thams cad rnam par bral //
analyzed: dogs pa thams cad rnam par bral //
translated: Is completely free from all doubts.

original: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ni //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ni //
translated: The wheel of great bliss

original: spyi bo'i gtsug na rtag tu bzhugs //
analyzed: spyi bo'i gtsug na rtag tu bzhugs //
translated: Always abides in the crown of the head.

original: rtsa yi 'khor lo rnam dag pa //
analyzed: rtsa yi 'khor lo rnam dag pa //
translated: The pure channel wheel

original: chu skyes 'dab ma sum cu gnyis //
analyzed: chu skyes 'dab ma sum cu gnyis //
translated: Is the thirty-two-petal lotus.

original: de ltar sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi khams kyi sku can gyi yi ge bzhi po las dang chos dang / chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi'i rang bzhin /
analyzed: de ltar sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi khams kyi sku can gyi yi ge bzhi po las dang chos dang / chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi'i rang bzhin /
translated: Thus, the four syllables, which have the nature of the elements of earth, water, fire, and wind, are the nature of the four seals: action, doctrine, greatness, and pledge.

original: snying rje chen po dang thabs chen po'i ngo bo /
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang thabs chen po'i ngo bo /
translated: They are the essence of great compassion and great means.

original: byams pa dang / smon lam gyi rang bzhin dga' ba dang / stobs kyi bdag nyid /
analyzed: byams pa dang / smon lam gyi rang bzhin dga' ba dang / stobs kyi bdag nyid /
translated: They are the nature of love, aspiration, joy, and power.

original: btang snyoms dang ye shes kyi dngos po /
analyzed: btang snyoms dang ye shes kyi dngos po /
translated: They are the entities of equanimity and wisdom.

original: tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa dang tha mi dad pa lte ba dang / snying ga dang mgrin pa dang / spyi bo'i rang bzhin sprul pa dang / chos dang longs spyod dang bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rnams rim par padma 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa dang tha mi dad pa lte ba dang / snying ga dang mgrin pa dang / spyi bo'i rang bzhin sprul pa dang / chos dang longs spyod dang bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rnams rim par padma 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /
translated: The four wheels are the nature of the four immeasurables, the navel, heart, throat, and head, and are the emanation, dharma, enjoyment, and great bliss wheels, respectively.

original: brgyad dang / bcu drug dang / sum cu rtsa gnyis te bzhi po rnams la bzhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: brgyad dang / bcu drug dang / sum cu rtsa gnyis te bzhi po rnams la bzhugs pa yin no //
translated: They are located on four lotuses with sixty-four, eight, sixteen, and thirty-two petals.

original: 'di nyid las 'khor lo gnyis gnyis ae dang wam gyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: 'di nyid las 'khor lo gnyis gnyis ae dang wam gyi rang bzhin te /
translated: In this tantra, each pair of wheels is the nature of e and vam.

original: de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: steng dang 'og tu mnyam sbyar bas //
analyzed: steng dang 'og tu mnyam sbyar bas //
translated: The union above and below

original: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las //
translated: is the nature of method and wisdom.

original: yi ge ae ni shes rab 'gyur /
analyzed: yi ge ae ni shes rab 'gyur /
translated: The letter e is wisdom,

original: wam ni thabs su bya ba yin //
analyzed: wam ni thabs su bya ba yin //
translated: and vam is the method.

original: 'di yang yi ge wam gyis brgyan //
analyzed: 'di yang yi ge wam gyis brgyan //
translated: This is also adorned with the letter vam.

original: yi ge ae yis nges par @6a * //
analyzed: yi ge ae yis nges par @6a * //
translated: The letter e definitely

original: mdzes // yi ge wam gyis snying gar mgrin //
analyzed: mdzes // yi ge wam gyis snying gar mgrin //
translated: adorns the throat and heart.

original: bla med chen por brgyan pa yin //
analyzed: bla med chen por brgyan pa yin //
translated: It is adorned with the great, unsurpassed

original: yi ge aes ni mgo dang lter //
analyzed: yi ge aes ni mgo dang lter //
translated: letter e at the head and navel.

original: brgyan pa phan tshun kha sbyor yin //
analyzed: brgyan pa phan tshun kha sbyor yin //
translated: The adornment is the mutual union.

original: sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid sku //🔽yi ge ae ni padmar brjod //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid sku // yi ge ae ni padmar brjod //
translated: The body is the nature of the five buddhas.🔽The syllable E is said to be the lotus.

original: wam ni rdo rje zhes byar bshad //
analyzed: wam ni rdo rje zhes byar bshad //
translated: The syllable VAM is explained to be the vajra.

original: de ni thabs su 'gyur ba ste //
analyzed: de ni thabs su 'gyur ba ste //
translated: That becomes the method.

original: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor ba //
analyzed: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor ba //
translated: The union of the vajra and lotus🔽is the lord of the dharma and emanation cakras,

original: chos dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i bdag / longs spyod 'khor los sbyar ba las //
analyzed: chos dang sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i bdag / longs spyod 'khor los sbyar ba las //
translated: united with the enjoyment cakra,

original: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor 'gro //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor 'gro //
translated: going to the great bliss cakra.

original: de ltar thams cad bzhi bzhi'o //
analyzed: de ltar thams cad bzhi bzhi'o //
translated: Thus, everything is in fours.

original: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
translated: Thus has the Blessed One taught.

original: gzhan yang gsungs pa //
analyzed: gzhan yang gsungs pa //
translated: Moreover, it is said:

original: ae yi cha byad bzang po gang //
analyzed: ae yi cha byad bzang po gang //
translated: Whatever is the auspicious form of E

original: dbus su wam gyis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: dbus su wam gyis rnam par brgyan //
translated: is adorned in the middle with VAM.

original: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas //
analyzed: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas //
translated: The abode of all bliss,🔽the jewel casket of the buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / de lta bur ni rgyud gsungs pa //🔽khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / de lta bur ni rgyud gsungs pa // khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa //
translated: such is the tantra taught.

original: khams gsum gyi ni ye shes che //
analyzed: khams gsum gyi ni ye shes che //
translated: The great wisdom of the three realms

original: 'byung ba bzhi yi rang bzhin can //
analyzed: 'byung ba bzhi yi rang bzhin can //
translated: has the nature of the four elements.

original: dbyangs yig sbyar ba la brten nas //
analyzed: dbyangs yig sbyar ba la brten nas //
translated: Relying on the combination of vowels and consonants,

original: nyi ma zla ba'i rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: nyi ma zla ba'i rang bzhin nyid //
translated: The nature of the sun and moon.

original: rnam shes tshor ba'i phung po ni //
analyzed: rnam shes tshor ba'i phung po ni //
translated: The aggregates of consciousness and feeling🔽Are the nature of Akṣobhya and Ratnasaṃbhava,

original: rang bzhin mi bskyod rin chen bdag / bdag med goo r'i sbyar ba las //
analyzed: rang bzhin mi bskyod rin chen bdag / bdag med goo r'i sbyar ba las //
translated: And the union of Nairātmyā and Gaurī.

original: ye shes lnga dang gsum rten las //
analyzed: ye shes lnga dang gsum rten las //
translated: From the support of the three and five pristine consciousnesses,

original: ye shes bco lnga'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: ye shes bco lnga'i rang bzhin can //
translated: The nature of the fifteen pristine consciousnesses

original: yi ge ae ni sa ru 'dod //
analyzed: yi ge ae ni sa ru 'dod //
translated: Is the syllable e, which is asserted to be earth.

original: gzhom du med pa'i ye shes che //
analyzed: gzhom du med pa'i ye shes che //
translated: The great, invincible pristine consciousness

original: dbyangs yig 'dus par rab tu gnas //
analyzed: dbyangs yig 'dus par rab tu gnas //
translated: Rests in the gathering of the vowels.

original: thabs dang shes rab yang dag ldan //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab yang dag ldan //
translated: Endowed with method and wisdom,

original: rdo rje gsum ni bzhi yi bdag /'byung ba lnga yi ye shes che //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni bzhi yi bdag /'byung ba lnga yi ye shes che //
translated: The three vajras are the nature of the four, the pristine consciousness of the five elements.

original: kha sbyor bas na dgu yi bdag /'di ni dkyil 'khor gnyis bdag nyid //
analyzed: kha sbyor bas na dgu yi bdag /'di ni dkyil 'khor gnyis bdag nyid //
translated: Since they are united, they are the nature of the nine.

original: yi ge ae ni spyan mar 'dod //
analyzed: yi ge ae ni spyan mar 'dod //
translated: The syllable e is asserted to be Locanā.

original: dbyangs yig sbyar ba la brten nas //
analyzed: dbyangs yig sbyar ba la brten nas //
translated: In dependence on the union with the vowels,

original: a'a li k'a li'i rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li'i rang bzhin nyid //
translated: The nature of ālikāli

original: 'du byed phung po rnam par shes //
analyzed: 'du byed phung po rnam par shes //
translated: Is the aggregate of formation and consciousness.

original: rang bzhin don yod rdo rje bdag / mkha' 'gro ma ni mkha' spyod sbyar //
analyzed: rang bzhin don yod rdo rje bdag / mkha' 'gro ma ni mkha' spyod sbyar //
translated: The nature of Amoghasiddhi is the union with the ḍākinī of the celestial realm.

original: ye shes lnga dang gsum rten las //
analyzed: ye shes lnga dang gsum rten las //
translated: The five and three pristine consciousnesses are based on the support.

original: bco lnga'i rang bzhin ye shes te //
analyzed: bco lnga'i rang bzhin ye shes te //
translated: The nature of the fifteen is pristine consciousness.

original: yi ge wam ni chu ru bshad //
analyzed: yi ge wam ni chu ru bshad //
translated: The syllable vam is explained to be water.

original: gzhom du med pa'i ye shes che //
analyzed: gzhom du med pa'i ye shes che //
translated: It is the great, invincible pristine consciousness.

original: dbyangs 'dus pa ni yang dag gnas //
analyzed: dbyangs 'dus pa ni yang dag gnas //
translated: The assembly of vowels is the perfect place.

original: thabs dang shes rab yang dag ldan //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab yang dag ldan //
translated: It is endowed with method and wisdom.

original: rdo rje gsum dang bzhi yi bdag /'byung ba lnga yi ye shes che //🔽kha sbyor gyis na dgu yi bdag / de ltar dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi bdag / wam yig m'a ma k'i ru 'dod //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum dang bzhi yi bdag /'byung ba lnga yi ye shes che // kha sbyor gyis na dgu yi bdag / de ltar dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi bdag / wam yig m'a ma k'i ru 'dod //
translated: It is the lord of the three and four vajras, the great pristine consciousness of the five elements.🔽It is the lord of the nine by means of union.🔽In that way, the lord of the two maṇḍalas is asserted to be the syllable vam.

original: dbyangs yig ldog pa la bsten nas //
analyzed: dbyangs yig ldog pa la bsten nas //
translated: The maṇḍala of Māmakī is the reverse of the vowels.

original: mkha' 'gro rdo rje sbyar ba las //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro rdo rje sbyar ba las //
translated: From the union of the ḍākinī and the vajra,

original: rnam shes @6b phung po la brten te //
analyzed: rnam shes @6b phung po la brten te //
translated: the aggregate of consciousness is based on

original: lha mo'i 'khor lo bsgom pa las //
analyzed: lha mo'i 'khor lo bsgom pa las //
translated: the meditation on the maṇḍala of the goddess.

original: ye shes bco lnga'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: ye shes bco lnga'i rang bzhin te //
translated: The nature of the fifteen pristine consciousnesses

original: yi ge ma ni me ru bshad //
analyzed: yi ge ma ni me ru bshad //
translated: is explained as the syllable ma.

original: gzhom du med pa'i ye shes che //
analyzed: gzhom du med pa'i ye shes che //
translated: It is the great, invincible pristine consciousness.

original: dbyangs yig med par yang dag gnas //
analyzed: dbyangs yig med par yang dag gnas //
translated: It is the perfect place without vowels.

original: thabs dang shes rab yang dag ldan //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab yang dag ldan //
translated: It is endowed with method and wisdom.

original: rdo rje gsum dang bzhi yi bdag /'byung ba lnga yi ye shes che //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum dang bzhi yi bdag /'byung ba lnga yi ye shes che //
translated: The lord of the three or four vajras, the great gnosis of the five elements,

original: kha sbyor bas na dgu yi bdag /'di ltar lha mo'i 'khor lo'i dngos //
analyzed: kha sbyor bas na dgu yi bdag /'di ltar lha mo'i 'khor lo'i dngos //
translated: the lord of the nine by means of union—such is the reality of the circle of goddesses.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas //
translated: Thus, the abode of the tathāgatas,

original: gnyi ga dbyer med rdzogs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: gnyi ga dbyer med rdzogs sangs rgyas //
translated: the perfect buddhahood of the inseparability of both,

original: ma yig gos dkar mo ru bshad //
analyzed: ma yig gos dkar mo ru bshad //
translated: is explained as the syllable ma, Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: dbyangs yig sbyor ba la brten nas //
analyzed: dbyangs yig sbyor ba la brten nas //
translated: In dependence on the application of the vowels,

original: a'a li k'a li rab tu sbyar //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li rab tu sbyar //
translated: the ālikāli is applied.🔽The nature of name and form, the nature of passion and ignorance,

original: ming dang gzugs su mngon brjod bdag /'dod chags gti mug rang bzhin bdag / chu ma rdo rje mnyam sbyor las //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs su mngon brjod bdag /'dod chags gti mug rang bzhin bdag / chu ma rdo rje mnyam sbyor las //
translated: from the union of the water and vajra goddesses,

original: ye shes lnga dang gsum rten nyid //
analyzed: ye shes lnga dang gsum rten nyid //
translated: the support of the five and three gnoses,

original: ye shes bco lnga'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: ye shes bco lnga'i rang bzhin can //
translated: the nature of the fifteen gnoses,

original: yi ge y'a ni rlung du bshad //
analyzed: yi ge y'a ni rlung du bshad //
translated: the syllable ya is explained as wind,

original: gzhom du med pa'i ye shes che //
analyzed: gzhom du med pa'i ye shes che //
translated: the great, invincible gnosis,

original: dbyangs yig 'dus par rab tu gnas //
analyzed: dbyangs yig 'dus par rab tu gnas //
translated: perfectly abiding in the collection of vowels.

original: thabs dang shes rab yang dag ldan //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab yang dag ldan //
translated: Endowed with method and wisdom,

original: rdo rje gsum ni bzhi yi bdag /'byung ba lnga yi ye shes bdag / kha sbyor gyis ni dgu yi bdag / de ltar dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi bdag / yi ge y'a ni sgron mar 'dod //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni bzhi yi bdag /'byung ba lnga yi ye shes bdag / kha sbyor gyis ni dgu yi bdag / de ltar dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi bdag / yi ge y'a ni sgron mar 'dod //
translated: and likewise, the lords of the two maṇḍalas.

original: ae wam ma y'a yi ge bzhi //
analyzed: ae wam ma y'a yi ge bzhi //
translated: The four syllables e, vaṃ, ma, and ya

original: re re 'ang gsum gyis bsgres pa rnams //
analyzed: re re 'ang gsum gyis bsgres pa rnams //
translated: are each multiplied by three.

original: de ni re re'ang rnam gnyis las //
analyzed: de ni re re'ang rnam gnyis las //
translated: Each one is also of two kinds.

original: spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin //
analyzed: spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin //
translated: The eyes are twenty-four.

original: ae wam ma y'a'i yi ge bzhi //
analyzed: ae wam ma y'a'i yi ge bzhi //
translated: The four syllables e, vaṃ, ma, and ya

original: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid //
translated: are the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: re re'ang rnam pa lngar phye bas //
analyzed: re re'ang rnam pa lngar phye bas //
translated: Each one is divided into five aspects,

original: brgya'am du ma'i rnam grangs 'gyur //
analyzed: brgya'am du ma'i rnam grangs 'gyur //
translated: becoming one hundred or many synonyms.

original: ae wam ma y'a'i yi ge bzhi //
analyzed: ae wam ma y'a'i yi ge bzhi //
translated: The four syllables e, vaṃ, ma, and ya🔽are the lords of the three vajras and four.

original: rdo rje gsum dang bzhi yi bdag / re re'i dbye ba la brten nas //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum dang bzhi yi bdag / re re'i dbye ba la brten nas //
translated: Based on the divisions of each one,

original: bzhi'am bcu yi n'a da can //
analyzed: bzhi'am bcu yi n'a da can //
translated: there are four or ten nāda signs.

original: bco lnga cha yi bdag nyid yin //
analyzed: bco lnga cha yi bdag nyid yin //
translated: It is the nature of fifteen parts.

original: aa sogs dbyangs yig der 'gyur te //
analyzed: aa sogs dbyangs yig der 'gyur te //
translated: The vowels are a and so on.

original: gsal byed rnams ni lnga lnga nyid //
analyzed: gsal byed rnams ni lnga lnga nyid //
translated: The consonants are five groups of five.

original: mthar gnas pa yi 'byung bzhi rnams //
analyzed: mthar gnas pa yi 'byung bzhi rnams //
translated: The four elements are the end.

original: sha sha sa 'di srid gsum bdag / rdo rje mi phyed gsum sbyor ba //
analyzed: sha sha sa 'di srid gsum bdag / rdo rje mi phyed gsum sbyor ba //
translated: The three existences are the lord of the three existences, the union of the three inseparable vajras.

original: yi ge ha las srid gsum 'byung //
analyzed: yi ge ha las srid gsum 'byung //
translated: The three existences arise from the syllable ha.

original: ye shes chen po gzhom du med //
analyzed: ye shes chen po gzhom du med //
translated: It is great wisdom, which cannot be destroyed.

original: rdo rje bzlas pa zhes su bshad /
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa zhes su bshad /
translated: It is explained as vajra repetition.

original: ae wam ma y'a'i yi ge bzhi //
analyzed: ae wam ma y'a'i yi ge bzhi //
translated: The four syllables e, vaṃ, ma, ya

original: skye mched drug dang sbyar ba las //
analyzed: skye mched drug dang sbyar ba las //
translated: are applied to the six sense bases.

original: rdor gsum dbye ba la brten nas //
analyzed: rdor gsum dbye ba la brten nas //
translated: In dependence on the division of the three vajras,

original: bco brgyad kyi ni rnam par 'dod //
analyzed: bco brgyad kyi ni rnam par 'dod //
translated: they are asserted to be of eighteen kinds.

original: phung po lnga yi ye shes dngos //
analyzed: phung po lnga yi ye shes dngos //
translated: The actual wisdom of the five aggregates

original: 'byung ba bzhi ru rab tu gnas //🔽rdor gsum @7a * //
analyzed: 'byung ba bzhi ru rab tu gnas // rdor gsum @7a * //
translated: is well situated in the four elements.

original: gnyis ni dbyer med pa //
analyzed: gnyis ni dbyer med pa //
translated: The two inseparable divisions of the three vajras

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su bshad //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su bshad //
translated: are explained as Vajrasattva.

original: de la sku gsum bdag nyid can //
analyzed: de la sku gsum bdag nyid can //
translated: In that, the nature of the three bodies

original: yi ge bzhi ru rab tu gnas //
analyzed: yi ge bzhi ru rab tu gnas //
translated: is well situated in the four syllables.

original: nam mkha' la ni 'ja' tshon ltar //
analyzed: nam mkha' la ni 'ja' tshon ltar //
translated: Like a rainbow in the sky,

original: shes nas rnal 'byor pas dngos grub //
analyzed: shes nas rnal 'byor pas dngos grub //
translated: the yogin who knows

original: yi ge bzhi po 'di dag 'grub //
analyzed: yi ge bzhi po 'di dag 'grub //
translated: attains the four syllables.

original: dngos grub thabs gzhan du na med //
analyzed: dngos grub thabs gzhan du na med //
translated: There is no other means of attainment.

original: yang na ae ni shes rab po //
analyzed: yang na ae ni shes rab po //
translated: Alternatively, e is wisdom,

original: wam ni thabs so //
analyzed: wam ni thabs so //
translated: vaṃ is method,

original: a'a li k'a li zla ba dang nyi ma dag thabs dang shes rab tu gyur pas na //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li zla ba dang nyi ma dag thabs dang shes rab tu gyur pas na //
translated: The vowels and consonants are the sun and moon, which are method and wisdom.

original: phyag gnyis sprul pa'i sku'o //🔽a'a li k'a li dag kyang ni //
analyzed: phyag gnyis sprul pa'i sku'o // a'a li k'a li dag kyang ni //
translated: The two-armed [form] is the nirmāṇakāya.

original: phyag bzhi pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: phyag bzhi pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: The four-armed [form] is the saṃbhogakāya.

original: zla ba nyi ma dag ni phyag drug pa chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma dag ni phyag drug pa chos kyi sku'o //
translated: The six-armed [form] is the dharmakāya.

original: de ltar sku gsum gyi bdag nyid 'di gnyis tha mi dad cing dbyer med pa de ni bcom ldan 'das phyag bcu drug pa ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i bdag nyid de bzhugs so //
analyzed: de ltar sku gsum gyi bdag nyid 'di gnyis tha mi dad cing dbyer med pa de ni bcom ldan 'das phyag bcu drug pa ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i bdag nyid de bzhugs so //
translated: Thus, these two forms, which are the essence of the three kāyas, are inseparable and undifferentiated. That is the sixteen-armed Bhagavat, the essence of the svabhāvakāya.

original: thams cad du khyab pas mi 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad du khyab pas mi 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'o //
translated: Since it pervades everything, it is the unchanging nature.

original: 'di nyid mngon par gsal ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid mngon par gsal ba'o //
translated: This is clearly evident.

original: bdag gis zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: bdag gis zhes bya ba ni //
translated: “I” is

original: sprul pa'i sku'i rgyus so //
analyzed: sprul pa'i sku'i rgyus so //
translated: the cause of the nirmāṇakāya.

original: thos pa zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: thos pa zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rtogs pa'o //
translated: “Heard” is the realization of the saṃbhogakāya.

original: gcig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: gcig ces bya ba ni /
translated: “One”

original: chos kyi sku'i rgyu mtshan no //
analyzed: chos kyi sku'i rgyu mtshan no //
translated: is the sign of the dharmakāya.

original: dus zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: dus zhes bya ba ni //
translated: “Time”🔽is the sign of the svabhāvakāya.

original: sku gsum tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i rang bzhin gyi 'bras bu'i rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: sku gsum tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i rang bzhin gyi 'bras bu'i rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: The result is Vajradhara, the nature of the svabhavikakaya, the essence of the inseparable three kayas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i bha ga la zhes bya ba ni /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa smos pas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i bha ga la zhes bya ba ni / de bzhin gshegs pa smos pas /
translated: In the bhaga of the queen of the vajra body, speech, and mind of all tathagatas.

original: me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'o //
analyzed: me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'o //
translated: The mention of tathagata refers to the five intuitions, mirror-like intuition, etc.

original: thams cad kyi sgras gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po ma lus pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad kyi sgras gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po ma lus pa ste /
translated: All refers to all things without exception, forms, etc.

original: thams cad kyang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
analyzed: thams cad kyang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
translated: All are tathagatas, because they are the nature of the tathagatas.

original: 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa med pa nyid do //
translated: This shows that there is nothing that is not the nature of the tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid sku gsung thugs rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid sku gsung thugs rnams so //
translated: Those tathagatas are the body, speech, and mind.

original: mi phyed pa'i ye shes de nyid rdo rje'o //
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i ye shes de nyid rdo rje'o //
translated: That indivisible intuition is the vajra.

original: de nyid btsun mo ste bdag med pas dogs pa thams cad bral bas so //
analyzed: de nyid btsun mo ste bdag med pas dogs pa thams cad bral bas so //
translated: That itself is the queen, because of the absence of self, one is free from all doubts.

original: de nyid bha ga ste /
analyzed: de nyid bha ga ste /
translated: That itself is the bhaga,

original: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan ma lus pa dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan ma lus pa dang ldan pas so //
translated: because he is endowed with all the qualities of Īśvara and so forth.

original: de la zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de la zhes pa ni /
translated: There, in that case,

original: rgyu mtshan de'i phyir na'o //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan de'i phyir na'o //
translated: for that reason.

original: de bas na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te /
analyzed: de bas na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te /
translated: Therefore, the Blessed One abides,

original: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis gdul bya sna tshogs kyi yid 'phrog pa mdzad do //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis gdul bya sna tshogs kyi yid 'phrog pa mdzad do //
translated: captivating the minds of the various disciples with various forms.

original: yang na bdag gis zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: yang na bdag gis zhes bya ba ni //
translated: Or, I,

original: me'i khams @7b dang rlung gi khams dag gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin des /
analyzed: me'i khams @7b dang rlung gi khams dag gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin des /
translated: by the nature of the non-duality of the fire element and the wind element,

original: lte bar gtum mo sbar ba yis //
analyzed: lte bar gtum mo sbar ba yis //
translated: having ignited the fierce fire at the navel,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs shing //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs shing //
translated: burns the five tathāgatas,

original: spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs pas //
analyzed: spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs pas //
translated: and also burns Locanā and so forth.

original: bsregs pas ri bong can ham 'dzag / bha ga'ang de'o //
analyzed: bsregs pas ri bong can ham 'dzag / bha ga'ang de'o //
translated: By burning, the rabbit-holder (moon) drips haṃ. The bhaga is also that.

original: thos pa ni 'dzag pa'i bya bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: thos pa ni 'dzag pa'i bya bar gyur pa'o //
translated: Hearing is the action of dripping.

original: de ci zhe na /
analyzed: de ci zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das te gcig go //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das te gcig go //
translated: The Blessed One, the one.

original: dus gcig na zhes pa ni /
analyzed: dus gcig na zhes pa ni /
translated: At one time,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnyis su med par rtogs pa'i skad cig la ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnyis su med par rtogs pa'i skad cig la ste /
translated: in the moment of realizing the non-duality of all tathāgatas,

original: de nyid bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: de nyid bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: He is the Bhagavān.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Residing in the bhaga of the Vajra Queen of all the Tathāgatas means

original: de kun rdzob kyi bden pas rnam par bzhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: de kun rdzob kyi bden pas rnam par bzhugs pa yin no //
