analyzed: aom a'a rya sma sv'a na pri y'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa ste /
translated: Oṃ, to the Noble One, the beloved of speech, hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ, phaṭ svāhā.

original: ji srid du sprin dral bar gyur pa'i bar de srid du sngags bzlas pa byas na de nas sprin dral bar 'gyur te sprin dral ba'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: ji srid du sprin dral bar gyur pa'i bar de srid du sngags bzlas pa byas na de nas sprin dral bar 'gyur te sprin dral ba'i cho ga'o //
translated: As long as the clouds are dispersed, one should recite the mantra. Then the clouds will be dispersed. This is the rite for dispersing clouds.

original: char dbab pa ni go sla ba nyid kyi don to //
analyzed: char dbab pa ni go sla ba nyid kyi don to //
translated: The rite for causing rain is easy to understand.

original: yang na aa zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa tsheg drag gi mtha' can no //
analyzed: yang na aa zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa tsheg drag gi mtha' can no //
translated: Or else, a is non-dual, with a visarga.

original: phu zhes pa ni tsheg drag gnyis kyi mtha' can no //
analyzed: phu zhes pa ni tsheg drag gnyis kyi mtha' can no //
translated: Ph is with two visarga.

original: 'di ni tsheg drag gnyis kyi mtha' can no //
analyzed: 'di ni tsheg drag gnyis kyi mtha' can no //
translated: This is with two visarga.

original: yi ge ni a'a li k'a li sreg pas yin no //
analyzed: yi ge ni a'a li k'a li sreg pas yin no //
translated: The syllable is burnt by the vowels and consonants.

original: mtha' yas smos pas mtha' med pa yin pas na mtha' yas te /
analyzed: mtha' yas smos pas mtha' med pa yin pas na mtha' yas te /
translated: Since it is said to be infinite, it is infinite.

original: thog ma dang bar dang tha ma las grol ba'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang bar dang tha ma las grol ba'o //
translated: It is liberated from beginning, middle, and end.

original: de'i gzugs brnyan ni so sor bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i gzugs brnyan ni so sor bya ba'o //
translated: Its reflection is the individual action.

original: byas la ni byas pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: byas la ni byas pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: Having done, it is done.

original: bdud rtsi lnga ni /
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga ni /
translated: The five nectars

original: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyis so //
translated: are by the nature of the five wisdoms.

original: blugs pa ni dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: blugs pa ni dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: Pouring is the bestowal of initiation.

original: me tog nag pos ni mchod pa ni nag po mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: me tog nag pos ni mchod pa ni nag po mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Worship with black flowers is Akṣobhya, black being Akṣobhya.

original: me tog bdag med ma'o //🔽gnyi gar tha mi dad pas so //
analyzed: me tog bdag med ma'o // gnyi gar tha mi dad pas so //
translated: The flower is Nairātmya.

original: mchod pa ni mchod pa'o //
analyzed: mchod pa ni mchod pa'o //
translated: Because of the non-differentiation of the two, worship is worship.

original: klu 'dul bar byed pa'i khu bas ni byug ni /
analyzed: klu 'dul bar byed pa'i khu bas ni byug ni /
translated: The snake-taming juice is the anointing.

original: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pas na klu ste skye ba dang 'jig pa las rnam par grol ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pas na klu ste skye ba dang 'jig pa las rnam par grol ba'o //
translated: The snake is the coming and going of the world, and it is tamed because it is liberated from origination and destruction.

original: de yang 'dul ba ni gtan nas nye bar zhi ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang 'dul ba ni gtan nas nye bar zhi ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is tamed because it is by nature completely pacified.

original: de yang byed pa ni /🔽yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de yang byed pa ni / yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: And that is made by the juice.

original: de'i khu ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de'i khu ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The juice is the nature of perfect wisdom, and it is characterized by experience.

original: des byug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de'i rang bzhin du bya'o zhes pa'i @25a * //
analyzed: des byug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de'i rang bzhin du bya'o zhes pa'i @25a * //
translated: By that anointing, the Tathāgatas are made of that nature, is the meaning.

original: don to // glang po che'i chang gis ni mgo bo byung ces pa la glang po che smos pa ni 'di la lag pa yod pas na glang po che ste /
analyzed: don to // glang po che'i chang gis ni mgo bo byung ces pa la glang po che smos pa ni 'di la lag pa yod pas na glang po che ste /
translated: The head is anointed with elephant juice - the elephant is so called because it has a trunk.

original: lnga pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid yin pas yul dang dbang po'i bdag nyid rnams phung po lnga'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma'o //
analyzed: lnga pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid yin pas yul dang dbang po'i bdag nyid rnams phung po lnga'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma'o //
translated: Since it is the nature of both, the nature of the object and the sense organ, the five aggregates are the Tathagatas and the dakinis.

original: de rnams kyi chang ni dga' ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi chang ni dga' ba'o //
translated: Their beer is joy.

original: des mgo bo byug pa ni /
analyzed: des mgo bo byug pa ni /
translated: Anointing the head with that

original: mgo bo ni sems la byug pa ste de'i rang bzhin du bya ba'o //
analyzed: mgo bo ni sems la byug pa ste de'i rang bzhin du bya ba'o //
translated: means anointing the head with the mind, making it of that nature.

original: dga' dang bde bas 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: dga' dang bde bas 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: One will be successful through joy and bliss.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
translated: This is the meaning of the verse.🔽One should place it in the joined vessel

original: kham por kha sbyar du ni gzhag / ces pa ni yang dag pa'i sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis gnyis su med pa'i rtog pas rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: kham por kha sbyar du ni gzhag / ces pa ni yang dag pa'i sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis gnyis su med pa'i rtog pas rnam par gzhag go //
translated: means that through the yoga of correct union, one should place it with the nondual thought.🔽With the milk of a black cow

original: ba nag mo'i 'o mas ni gang zhes pa la /
analyzed: ba nag mo'i 'o mas ni gang zhes pa la /
translated: means

original: ba nag mo ni thabs dang shes rab tha mi dad pa'o //
analyzed: ba nag mo ni thabs dang shes rab tha mi dad pa'o //
translated: the black cow is the inseparability of method and wisdom.

original: 'o ma ni byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: 'o ma ni byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: The milk is the bodhicitta.

original: des dgang ba ni tshim par btung ba'o //
analyzed: des dgang ba ni tshim par btung ba'o //
translated: One should fill it with that, drink it, and be satisfied.

original: gzhon nu ma nag mos bkal ba'i skud pas ni dkri zhes pa la /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma nag mos bkal ba'i skud pas ni dkri zhes pa la /
translated: One should wrap it with thread spun by a dark-complexioned maiden.

original: gzhon nu ma nag mo'i sgras shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: gzhon nu ma nag mo'i sgras shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: The thread spun by the young black woman is the wisdom of the nature of method and wisdom.

original: des bkal ba'i skud pa ni rgyun chad pa'o //
analyzed: des bkal ba'i skud pa ni rgyun chad pa'o //
translated: The spinning is the uninterrupted stream.

original: des dkri ba ni bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: des dkri ba ni bsgom pa'o //
translated: The spinning is the meditation.

original: rlung gi phyogs su rdzing bu byas te mtha' yas der gzhag go zhes pa la /
analyzed: rlung gi phyogs su rdzing bu byas te mtha' yas der gzhag go zhes pa la /
translated: Having made a pond in the wind direction, place Ananta there.

original: rlung gi phyogs zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rlung gi phyogs zhes pa ni /
translated: The wind direction is

original: rlung gi rang bzhin gyi n'a da'o //
analyzed: rlung gi rang bzhin gyi n'a da'o //
translated: the nāḍī of the nature of wind.

original: mtha' yas ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: mtha' yas ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: Ananta is Vajrasattva.

original: rdzing bu ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: rdzing bu ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The pond is the great seal.

original: byas te gzhag pa ni cha med par rnam par gzhag par bya ste /
analyzed: byas te gzhag pa ni cha med par rnam par gzhag par bya ste /
translated: Having made it, place it means that it should be placed without parts.

original: rdzing bu de'i phyag rgyas so //
analyzed: rdzing bu de'i phyag rgyas so //
translated: The pond is sealed by that.

original: 'gram ni de dang nye bar ro //
analyzed: 'gram ni de dang nye bar ro //
translated: The bank is near that.

original: dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya ste zhes pa ni bskyed par bya ba ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya ste zhes pa ni bskyed par bya ba ste /
translated: Having made the maṇḍala means that it should be generated.

original: de yang spro ba'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de yang spro ba'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Moreover, it is the nature of emanation.

original: nag po ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: nag po ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Black is Akṣobhya.

original: dkar po'i ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: dkar po'i ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: White is Vairocana.

original: ser po ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: ser po ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: Yellow is Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: ljang gu ni don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: ljang gu ni don yod grub pa'o //
translated: Green is Amoghasiddhi.

original: sngon po drug pa rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: sngon po drug pa rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: Blue is Vajradhara, the sixth.

original: 'di yang rdul tshon gyi tshul te /
analyzed: 'di yang rdul tshon gyi tshul te /
translated: This is the way of the colored powders.

original: rdul tshon rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o //🔽rdul tshon 'di rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bzhengs so zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rdul tshon rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o // rdul tshon 'di rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bzhengs so zhes pa ni /
translated: The colored powders are Vajraḍāka.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa bskyed par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa bskyed par bya ba'o //
translated: With these colored powders, one should construct the maṇḍala means that one should generate Vajradhara, who is the nature of all tathāgatas.

original: bya ba gzhan gsungs pa /
analyzed: bya ba gzhan gsungs pa /
translated: Another action is stated:

original: dur khrod kyi sol ba ni /
analyzed: dur khrod kyi sol ba ni /
translated: The charnel ground ash

original: dbugs dbyung zhes bya'i rigs pa 'dis //
analyzed: dbugs dbyung zhes bya'i rigs pa 'dis //
translated: is the family called “exhalation.”

original: dur khrod ces ni mngon @25b par brjod //
analyzed: dur khrod ces ni mngon @25b par brjod //
translated: It is called “charnel ground.”

original: ces pa'o // gnyi ga'i n'a da ni aam mkha' spyod do //
analyzed: ces pa'o // gnyi ga'i n'a da ni aam mkha' spyod do //
translated: The nāda of both is aṃ, which is Khecarī.

original: 'di'i rang bzhin gyis ni sgra bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i rang bzhin gyis ni sgra bstan pa'o //
translated: The nature of this is taught by the word.

original: de nas nag po mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: de nas nag po mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Then, black is Akṣobhya.

original: skyes pa'i rus pa'i phye mas ni skyes pa sku rdo rje'o //
analyzed: skyes pa'i rus pa'i phye mas ni skyes pa sku rdo rje'o //
translated: With the powder of a man’s bone means a man is the vajra body.

original: de'i rus pa ni cha med pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: de'i rus pa ni cha med pa'i tshul lo //
translated: His bone is the partless way.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: phye ma ste /
analyzed: phye ma ste /
translated: It is the powder.

original: rdul phra rab kyi tshul gyis so //
analyzed: rdul phra rab kyi tshul gyis so //
translated: by the mode of the subtle particle.

original: dkar po rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: dkar po rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: White is Vairocana.

original: ldong ros zhes pa ni /
analyzed: ldong ros zhes pa ni /
translated: Vermillion is

original: kha sbyor gyis 'od dpag tu med par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: kha sbyor gyis 'od dpag tu med par 'jug pa'o //
translated: the union of the two, which enters into Amitābha.

original: ser po ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: ser po ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: Yellow is Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: dur khrod kyi so phag ni //
analyzed: dur khrod kyi so phag ni //
translated: The brick of the charnel ground is

original: dur khrod ni gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi n'a da 'dod pa'i phyir dang khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dur khrod ni gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi n'a da 'dod pa'i phyir dang khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the charnel ground, which is the naḍa of both natures, because it is desired and because it pervades.

original: gang gi zhe na bde bas te chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi zhe na bde bas te chags pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: By what? By bliss, which is the characteristic of passion.

original: dmar po ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //🔽rkun mo'i lo ma dang / skyes pa'i rus pa'i phye ma dag gis ni zhes pa la mi rus dang rkun ma skyes pa thabs so //
analyzed: dmar po ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o // rkun mo'i lo ma dang / skyes pa'i rus pa'i phye ma dag gis ni zhes pa la mi rus dang rkun ma skyes pa thabs so //
translated: Red is Amitābha.🔽By the powder of human bone and the leaf of the woman,

original: rus pa shes rab po //
analyzed: rus pa shes rab po //
translated: the bone is the method, and the woman is the wisdom.

original: gnyi gar gyis sku ste thim par gyur to //
analyzed: gnyi gar gyis sku ste thim par gyur to //
translated: The two together are the body, which is the state of union.

original: de yang lo ma ni ye shes so //
analyzed: de yang lo ma ni ye shes so //
translated: Moreover, the leaf is gnosis.

original: sku'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par snang mdzad 'jug go //
analyzed: sku'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par snang mdzad 'jug go //
translated: The nature of the body is the entry into Vairocana.

original: ljang gu ni don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: ljang gu ni don yod grub pa'o //
translated: Green is Amoghasiddhi.

original: 'dir gnyis kyi tshig ni mi'i rus pa ni thabs dang shes rab tha mi dad pa'i sku rdo rje'o //
analyzed: 'dir gnyis kyi tshig ni mi'i rus pa ni thabs dang shes rab tha mi dad pa'i sku rdo rje'o //
translated: Here, the words “two” are the body vajra, the indivisibility of method and wisdom.

original: dur khrod ni a'a li k'a li ste gsung rdo rje'o //
analyzed: dur khrod ni a'a li k'a li ste gsung rdo rje'o //
translated: The charnel ground is the speech vajra, the ālikāli.

original: sol ba ni thugs rdo rje'o //
analyzed: sol ba ni thugs rdo rje'o //
translated: The charcoal is the mind vajra.

original: re re zhing yang ye shes lnga rnams la 'jug go //
analyzed: re re zhing yang ye shes lnga rnams la 'jug go //
translated: Each of these is also engaged in the five gnoses.

original: sngon po rdo rje 'dzin pa yin te 'di ni gnyis kyi tshig go //
analyzed: sngon po rdo rje 'dzin pa yin te 'di ni gnyis kyi tshig go //
translated: The blue is the vajra holder. This is the word of the two.

original: dur khrod kyi srad bus thig gdab cing zhes pa ni /
analyzed: dur khrod kyi srad bus thig gdab cing zhes pa ni /
translated: “The chalk line of the charnel ground”

original: a'a li k'a li dag gi dbus su thig skud aa wa dh'u t'i'o /
analyzed: a'a li k'a li dag gi dbus su thig skud aa wa dh'u t'i'o /
translated: is the central nāḍī, the a-va-dha-u-ṭi, in the middle of the ālikāli.

original: des rgyud kyi rgyud la thig btab pa'o //
analyzed: des rgyud kyi rgyud la thig btab pa'o //
translated: That is the chalk line of the tantra.

original: dkyil 'khor khru gsum pa ni bco lnga'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor khru gsum pa ni bco lnga'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The three-cubit maṇḍala is the nature of fifteen.

original: de'i dbus su zhes pa ni de'i phyogs so //
analyzed: de'i dbus su zhes pa ni de'i phyogs so //
translated: “In the middle of that” is in the middle of that.

original: mtha' yas mnan pa ni rnam pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: mtha' yas mnan pa ni rnam pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: “Stepping on Ananta” is the nature of all aspects.

original: dgyes pa'i rdo rje bri zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dgyes pa'i rdo rje bri zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Draw Hevajra”

original: dgod par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dgod par bya ba'i don to //
translated: means “one should draw.”

original: cis khyad par du 'phags she na /
analyzed: cis khyad par du 'phags she na /
translated: How is it distinguished?

original: zhal brgyad pa /
analyzed: zhal brgyad pa /
translated: “Eight faces”

original: zhabs bzhi pa /
analyzed: zhabs bzhi pa /
translated: He has four feet.

original: phyag bcu drug gis brgyan pa /
analyzed: phyag bcu drug gis brgyan pa /
translated: He is adorned with sixteen arms.

original: spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhis che ba zhes pa la /
analyzed: spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhis che ba zhes pa la /
translated: He is great with twenty-four eyes.

original: lha mo brgyad kyi rnam par dag pa zhal brgyad do //
analyzed: lha mo brgyad kyi rnam par dag pa zhal brgyad do //
translated: The eight goddesses are the eight faces, which are the purities of the eight joys.

original: dga' ba bzhi'i rnam par dag pa zhabs bzhi'o //🔽rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rnam par dag pa drug go //🔽bcu ni dbang po lnga dang yul lnga'i rnam par dag @26a * //
analyzed: dga' ba bzhi'i rnam par dag pa zhabs bzhi'o // rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rnam par dag pa drug go // bcu ni dbang po lnga dang yul lnga'i rnam par dag @26a * //
translated: The four feet are the purities of the four joys.

original: pas phyag bcu drug yin no //
analyzed: pas phyag bcu drug yin no //
translated: The sixteen arms are the purities of the ten, which are the five sense powers and the five sense objects, and the six, which are the purities of the five gnoses and Vajrasattva.

original: spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhis che ba zhes pa ni /
analyzed: spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhis che ba zhes pa ni /
translated: He is great with twenty-four eyes.

original: sa bcu gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sa bcu gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa'o //
translated: The twenty-four are the ten grounds, the eight abodes, and the four near-abodes.

original: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dag brgyad dang / zhing dang nye ba'i zhing la sogs pa bcu drug ste /
analyzed: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dag brgyad dang / zhing dang nye ba'i zhing la sogs pa bcu drug ste /
translated: The sixteen are the eight abodes and the eight near-abodes, the sixteen, such as the fields and near-fields.

original: 'di rnams kyi rnam par dag pas so ;
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi rnam par dag pas so ;
translated: He is great with twenty-four eyes, which are the purities of these.

original: / de lta bur gyur pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje yin no //
analyzed: / de lta bur gyur pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje yin no //
translated: He is such a Hevajra.

original: khams gsum gyis mchod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: khams gsum gyis mchod par bya ba'o //
translated: He is to be worshipped by the three realms.

original: sngags bzlas te zhes pa ni /
analyzed: sngags bzlas te zhes pa ni /
translated: Reciting the mantra means

original: ye shes sngon du bya ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes sngon du bya ba'o //
translated: that the wisdom is to be performed beforehand.

original: rgyu gang gis shes na /
analyzed: rgyu gang gis shes na /
translated: By what cause is it known?

original: nang gi ma rungs pa'i sems kyis zhes pa ste nang ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: nang gi ma rungs pa'i sems kyis zhes pa ste nang ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin gyis so //
translated: By the inner unruly mind means that the inner is by the nature of the conventional truth.

original: ma rungs pa'i sems kyis ni /
analyzed: ma rungs pa'i sems kyis ni /
translated: The unruly mind

original: don dam pa'i bden pas so //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pas so //
translated: is by the ultimate truth.

original: gnyi ga dbyor mi byed pas zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gnyi ga dbyor mi byed pas zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that both are not to be mixed.

original: dben pa'i gnas su zhes pa ni /
analyzed: dben pa'i gnas su zhes pa ni /
translated: In a solitary place means

original: skye bos dben pa'i sa phyogs su'o //
analyzed: skye bos dben pa'i sa phyogs su'o //
translated: in a place free from people.

original: aom gha ta gha ta /
analyzed: aom gha ta gha ta /
translated: Oṃ ghata ghata

original: ghu tu ghu tu /
analyzed: ghu tu ghu tu /
translated: ghūta ghūta

original: ma sa ma sa /🔽gha ta gha ta /
analyzed: ma sa ma sa / gha ta gha ta /
translated: masa masa🔽ghāta ghāta

original: gho ta ya gho ta ya /
analyzed: gho ta ya gho ta ya /
translated: ghotāya ghotāya

original: aa nanta ksho bha ka r'a ya n'a g'a dhi pa ta ye he he ru ru ka sapta p'a t'a la n'a g'a n'a karsha ya /
analyzed: aa nanta ksho bha ka r'a ya n'a g'a dhi pa ta ye he he ru ru ka sapta p'a t'a la n'a g'a n'a karsha ya /
translated: anantakṣobhakārāya nāgādhipataye he he ru ru kā sapta pāṭālā nāgānā karṣaya🔽garja ya tarja ya phu

original: gardza ya ta rdza ya phu zhes pa brgyad h'um h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes pa la /
analyzed: gardza ya ta rdza ya phu zhes pa brgyad h'um h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes pa la /
translated: The eight hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā

original: aom zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: aom zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'o //
translated: Oṃ means the indivisibility of the three vajras.

original: gha ta gha ta zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: gha ta gha ta zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: Ghata ghata and so forth

original: thabs dang shes rab gnyis 'gyur la bzhi bzhir gyur pas stong pa nyid bcu drug go //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab gnyis 'gyur la bzhi bzhir gyur pas stong pa nyid bcu drug go //
translated: are the sixteen emptinesses, since they are divided into four groups of four, with the two, method and wisdom, each doubled.

original: gho ta ya gho ta ya zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum nyis 'gyur gyis drug pa rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: gho ta ya gho ta ya zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum nyis 'gyur gyis drug pa rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: Ghota ghota is Vajradhara, the sixth, since the three vajras are doubled.

original: aa nanta ksho bha ka r'a ya ni khams gsum bsdus pa'i bdag nyid kyi sku ste mtha' yas ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: aa nanta ksho bha ka r'a ya ni khams gsum bsdus pa'i bdag nyid kyi sku ste mtha' yas ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: Ananta kshobhakaraaya is the body whose nature is the collection of the three realms. Ananta is Vajradhara.

original: de yang ksho bha ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: de yang ksho bha ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Moreover, kshobhaka is Akshobhya.

original: de yang ka r'a ya ni ka thabs so //
analyzed: de yang ka r'a ya ni ka thabs so //
translated: Moreover, karaaya is ka, method.

original: ra bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: ra bdag med ma'o //
translated: Ra is Nairatma.

original: gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes so //
analyzed: gnyi ga dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes so //
translated: The two are inseparable, the nature of gnosis.

original: de yang n'a g'a dhi pa ta ni /
analyzed: de yang n'a g'a dhi pa ta ni /
translated: Moreover, nagaadhipatani.

original: n'a g'a ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
analyzed: n'a g'a ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
translated: Naga is the Tathagatas.

original: de las lhag par gtso bo'am bdag por gyur par gnas pas na n'a dhi pa ta'o //
analyzed: de las lhag par gtso bo'am bdag por gyur par gnas pas na n'a dhi pa ta'o //
translated: Since it abides as the lord or master over them, it is nagaadhipati.

original: de yang bdag med ma dang dkar mo gnyis tha mi dad pas so //
analyzed: de yang bdag med ma dang dkar mo gnyis tha mi dad pas so //
translated: Moreover, it is because of the non-difference of Nairatma and Pandara.

original: he he zhes pa ni /
analyzed: he he zhes pa ni /
translated: He he is the laughter of the hero.

original: rgyu la sogs pa spangs pas rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir he he gnyis so //
analyzed: rgyu la sogs pa spangs pas rgyu dang bral ba'i phyir he he gnyis so //
translated: The two he-he-s are because of being free from causes, due to abandoning causes and so forth.

original: ru ru zhes pa ni /
analyzed: ru ru zhes pa ni /
translated: The two ru-ru-s are

original: yi ge ru tshogs pa dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: yi ge ru tshogs pa dang bral ba ste /
translated: because of being free from the assembly of syllables,

original: rnam par rtog pa'i rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: and free from the conceptual thought of conceptuality.

original: ka ni gang du yang mi gnas pa ste /
analyzed: ka ni gang du yang mi gnas pa ste /
translated: The ka is because of not abiding anywhere,

original: de'i @26b byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i @26b byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: due to the empowerment of that.

original: sapta p'a t'a la ga t'am zhes pa la /
analyzed: sapta p'a t'a la ga t'am zhes pa la /
translated: The seven pāṭālāgatāṃs are

original: sapta ni drug pa rdo rje 'dzin pa ye shes lnga la 'jug pas so //
analyzed: sapta ni drug pa rdo rje 'dzin pa ye shes lnga la 'jug pas so //
translated: the seven are the sixth, Vajradhara, who enters the five gnoses.

original: p'a t'a la ga t'am ni phung po lnga dang 'byung ba bzhi son pa ste ba'i sgras gos dkar mo me'i khams so //
analyzed: p'a t'a la ga t'am ni phung po lnga dang 'byung ba bzhi son pa ste ba'i sgras gos dkar mo me'i khams so //
translated: The pāṭālāgatāṃs are the five aggregates and the four elements, with the syllable va being Pāṇḍaravāsinī, the fire element.

original: a'a karsha ya ni bsdus pas byang chub kyi sems kyi bdag nyid du byed pa'o //
analyzed: a'a karsha ya ni bsdus pas byang chub kyi sems kyi bdag nyid du byed pa'o //
translated: The ākarṣaya is the gathering, which is the nature of bodhicitta.

original: barsha ya gardza ya ta rdza ya zhes pa ni /
analyzed: barsha ya gardza ya ta rdza ya zhes pa ni /
translated: The varṣaya garjaya tarjaya are

original: spo ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pas gnyis su med par rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: spo ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pas gnyis su med par rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: the stages of transference and gathering, which is the nature of Vajradhara, the realization of nonduality.

original: de yang phu brgyad thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam par dag pas stong pa nyid du bcu drug gi rnam par dag pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de yang phu brgyad thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam par dag pas stong pa nyid du bcu drug gi rnam par dag pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Moreover, since the eight syllables are pure as method and wisdom, the meaning is that they are pure as the sixteen emptinesses.

original: h'um h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes pa la h'um zhes pa ni skad cig ma bzhi tha mi dad pa'o //
analyzed: h'um h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes pa la h'um zhes pa ni skad cig ma bzhi tha mi dad pa'o //
translated: Hum hum hum phat phat svaha. Hum is the indivisibility of the four moments.

original: phat phat yang skad cig ma bzhi dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: phat phat yang skad cig ma bzhi dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
translated: Phat phat is the indivisibility of the four moments.

original: sva ni rdo rje gsum mo //
analyzed: sva ni rdo rje gsum mo //
translated: Sva is the three vajras.

original: h'a ni thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: h'a ni thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'o //
translated: Ha is the indivisibility of method and wisdom.

original: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi char 'bab pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi char 'bab pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is the rain of the nature of emptiness endowed with the supreme of all aspects.

original: gal te char mi 'bab na de'i tshe sngags 'di bzlog pas bzlas te zhes pa ni /
analyzed: gal te char mi 'bab na de'i tshe sngags 'di bzlog pas bzlas te zhes pa ni /
translated: If it does not rain, then at that time, one should recite this mantra in reverse.

original: sngags 'di ni ye shes 'di phyin ci log tu bzlas pas ye shes kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngags 'di ni ye shes 'di phyin ci log tu bzlas pas ye shes kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: This mantra is the wisdom recited in reverse. By reciting it in reverse, it becomes wisdom alone.

original: ye shes 'di yang char 'bab pa yin no //
analyzed: ye shes 'di yang char 'bab pa yin no //
translated: This wisdom is the rain.

original: bya ba med par bya ba'i sgo nas rnam par gzhag pas phyin ci log gi sngags bzlas pa yin no //
analyzed: bya ba med par bya ba'i sgo nas rnam par gzhag pas phyin ci log gi sngags bzlas pa yin no //
translated: Since it is established by way of the absence of activity, it is the recitation of the mantra of error.

original: bya ba yang sngar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba yang sngar bstan pa'o //
translated: And activity is as previously explained.

original: gal te char mi 'bab pa de'i tshe mgo 'gas pa yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: gal te char mi 'bab pa de'i tshe mgo 'gas pa yin no zhes pa /
translated: If it does not rain, then the head will split.

original: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: gal te char mi 'bab na ni byang chub kyi sems nye bar bsdus par ma gyur na de'i tshe mgo 'gas pa ni /
analyzed: gal te char mi 'bab na ni byang chub kyi sems nye bar bsdus par ma gyur na de'i tshe mgo 'gas pa ni /
translated: If it does not rain, then if the bodhicitta is not drawn together, then at that time the head will split.

original: rdo rje 'dzin par gsal bar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin par gsal bar gyur pa yin no //
translated: It is the clear appearance as Vajradhara.

original: aa rdza ka'i dog pa lta bu ni snye ma ste /
analyzed: aa rdza ka'i dog pa lta bu ni snye ma ste /
translated: The shape of an arjaka fruit is a bud.

original: aa bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: aa bdag med ma'o //
translated: A is Nairātmya.

original: dza'i sgra ni sde tshan gnyis pa'i bdag nyid kyi gsum pa rnam par dga' ba'o //
analyzed: dza'i sgra ni sde tshan gnyis pa'i bdag nyid kyi gsum pa rnam par dga' ba'o //
translated: The sound ja is the third of the second group, which is delight.

original: de yang ras brgyan pa ste bdag med ma dang 'khril ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang ras brgyan pa ste bdag med ma dang 'khril ba yin no //
translated: And that is adorned with cloth, which is the embrace of Nairātmya.

original: ka lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ka lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Ka is the nature of the innate.

original: de'i snye ma ni sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su spro ba'i tshul can yin te /
analyzed: de'i snye ma ni sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su spro ba'i tshul can yin te /
translated: Its bud is the method of emanating in various forms.

original: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Vajradhara, whose nature is the emanation and gathering of the buddhas.

original: char dbab pa'i cha'o //
analyzed: char dbab pa'i cha'o //
translated: The rainy season.

original: sprin dral ba bshad de zhes pa ni 'dir gtor zhing blugs pas ni sprin dral ba ste dbang ngo //
analyzed: sprin dral ba bshad de zhes pa ni 'dir gtor zhing blugs pas ni sprin dral ba ste dbang ngo //
translated: The breaking of the clouds is explained as the empowerment.

original: byang chub kyi sems shar ba des dri ma med pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi sku gsum dang ye shes la yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems shar ba des dri ma med pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi sku gsum dang ye shes la yin no //
translated: The arising of the bodhicitta is the three bodies and the four pristine awarenesses, which have the nature of being stainless.

original: @27a * // dral ni spro ba'o //
analyzed: @27a * // dral ni spro ba'o //
translated: The breaking is the emanation.

original: bshad de ni gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: bshad de ni gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: The explanation is the illumination.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: bden pa gnyis tha mi dad pa nyid bden pa gnyis yin no //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis tha mi dad pa nyid bden pa gnyis yin no //
translated: The non-difference of the two truths is the two truths.

original: dur khrod kyi ras la nye bar 'dug nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dur khrod kyi ras la nye bar 'dug nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Seated on a charnel ground cloth.

original: dur khrod ni a'a li k'a li'o //
analyzed: dur khrod ni a'a li k'a li'o //
translated: The charnel ground is ākālika.

original: de yang ras ni phan tshun du 'gegs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang ras ni phan tshun du 'gegs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, the cloth is the mutual obstruction.

original: de la nye bar 'dug nas ni /
analyzed: de la nye bar 'dug nas ni /
translated: Seated on that.

original: khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i tshul gyis gang gnas pa'o /
analyzed: khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i tshul gyis gang gnas pa'o /
translated: Seated in the manner of the pervaded and the pervader.

original: sngags bzlas pa ni ye shes mngon du bya ba ste ye shes de'o //
analyzed: sngags bzlas pa ni ye shes mngon du bya ba ste ye shes de'o //
translated: The mantra recitation is the manifestation of gnosis, which is that gnosis.

original: aom a'a rya sma s'a na pri y'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a rya sma s'a na pri y'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Om, Aryasmanasanapriya, hum hum hum phat svāhā.

original: aom ni rdo rje gsum tha mi dad pa'o //
analyzed: aom ni rdo rje gsum tha mi dad pa'o //
translated: Om is the indivisibility of the three vajras.

original: a'a ni rdo rje ste gzugs kyi phung po rnam par snang mdzad dang sku rdo rje'o //
analyzed: a'a ni rdo rje ste gzugs kyi phung po rnam par snang mdzad dang sku rdo rje'o //
translated: Ā is the vajra, the form aggregate, Vairocana, and the vajra body.

original: ra ni bdag med ma gzugs rdo rje'o //
analyzed: ra ni bdag med ma gzugs rdo rje'o //
translated: Ra is Nairātmya, the vajra of form.

original: ya ni g-yung mo rlung gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir gsung rdo rje yin te rdo rje g-yung mo'o //
analyzed: ya ni g-yung mo rlung gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir gsung rdo rje yin te rdo rje g-yung mo'o //
translated: Ya is Locanā, the vajra of speech, because she is the nature of wind, the vajra Locanā.

original: de nyid sma s'a na ste n'a da phreng gnyis po de dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid sma s'a na ste n'a da phreng gnyis po de dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That itself is smasan, because it is not different from the two garlands of nādas.

original: pri y'a ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: pri y'a ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: Priya is Vajradhara.

original: de yang ye shes 'di ni ye shes 'di nyid do //
analyzed: de yang ye shes 'di ni ye shes 'di nyid do //
translated: That also is this gnosis, this very gnosis.

original: h'um phat ces pa ni de dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: h'um phat ces pa ni de dbyer med pa'o //
translated: Hum phat is their indivisibility.

original: sv'a h'a zhes pa la /
analyzed: sv'a h'a zhes pa la /
translated: As for svāhā,

original: sv'a ni rdo rje gsum mo //
analyzed: sv'a ni rdo rje gsum mo //
translated: svā is the three vajras.

original: h'a ni thabs dang shes rab tha mi dad pa yin te song zin pa'i don to //
analyzed: h'a ni thabs dang shes rab tha mi dad pa yin te song zin pa'i don to //
translated: Hā is the indivisibility of method and wisdom, the meaning of “gone. ”

original: sprin dral ba'i cho ga'o ni spro ba dang bsdu ba bstan pa'o //
analyzed: sprin dral ba'i cho ga'o ni spro ba dang bsdu ba bstan pa'o //
translated: The ritual of the dispersion of clouds is the teaching of the emanation and gathering.

original: da ni gnyis ka bsdu ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni gnyis ka bsdu ba gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the gathering of both is taught.

original: pha rol gyi sde rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir rdo rgyus kyi sgrub pa bshad de zhes pa ni pha rol ni dgra'o //
analyzed: pha rol gyi sde rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir rdo rgyus kyi sgrub pa bshad de zhes pa ni pha rol ni dgra'o //
translated: The explanation of the practice of chalk for the destruction of the enemy armies is the enemy is the foe.

original: de rnams kyi sde ni dpung ngo //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sde ni dpung ngo //
translated: Their armies are the troops.

original: de rnam par gzhig par 'dod pas rdo rgyus kyi sgrub pa bya'o //
analyzed: de rnam par gzhig par 'dod pas rdo rgyus kyi sgrub pa bya'o //
translated: One who desires to destroy them should perform the practice of chalk.

original: de bshad pa ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de bshad pa ni bstan pa'o //
translated: The explanation of that is the teaching.

original: rdo rgyus kyi sgrub pa de ji lta bu yin pa gsungs pa //🔽rdo rgyus dang bdud rtsi lnga dang ku tha ratsitshan na lhan cig btags la /
analyzed: rdo rgyus kyi sgrub pa de ji lta bu yin pa gsungs pa // rdo rgyus dang bdud rtsi lnga dang ku tha ratsitshan na lhan cig btags la /
translated: It is said, What is that practice of chalk?

original: ri lu byas te /
analyzed: ri lu byas te /
translated: One should make a pill of chalk, the five ambrosias, and kutaja, and make a pill.

original: ri lu bya ba'i sngags ni /
analyzed: ri lu bya ba'i sngags ni /
translated: The mantra for making the pill is:

original: aom badzra ka rta ri he badzr'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa ni /
analyzed: aom badzra ka rta ri he badzr'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa ni /
translated: Oṃ vajra-karṭari he vajra-āyai hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: ri lu bsgrubs pa de thogs nas dngos grub kyi don du bya ba bzlas shing sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas te zhes pa ni sngar gyi rdo rgyus bzung ste sngags 'bum bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: ri lu bsgrubs pa de thogs nas dngos grub kyi don du bya ba bzlas shing sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas te zhes pa ni sngar gyi rdo rgyus bzung ste sngags 'bum bzla bar bya'o //
translated: Taking that pill which has been accomplished, one should recite the mantra for the sake of siddhi, and having previously done a hundred thousand repetitions,

original: rjes thogs su sngags bye ba bzlas nas rdo rgyus de thogs te bsgrub bya pha rol gyi sde'i gzugs bsams nas ril ba spyi blugs kyis bsgrub bya'i mgrin pa bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: rjes thogs su sngags bye ba bzlas nas rdo rgyus de thogs te bsgrub bya pha rol gyi sde'i gzugs bsams nas ril ba spyi blugs kyis bsgrub bya'i mgrin pa bskor bar bya'o //
translated: one should recite ten million mantras, and taking that pill, one should imagine the form of the enemy army and circle the throat of the enemy with the water-pot.

original: bskor nas bcag na dgra thams cad kyi mgo med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bskor nas bcag na dgra thams cad kyi mgo med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having circled it, if one breaks it, all the heads of the enemies will be broken.

original: rdo rje gri gug gi cho ga'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gri gug gi cho ga'o //
translated: This is the procedure of the vajra knife.

original: yang na pha rol gyi @27b sde rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir zhes pa ni pha rol ni yul lo //
analyzed: yang na pha rol gyi @27b sde rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir zhes pa ni pha rol ni yul lo //
translated: Or, in order to destroy the enemy army, the enemy is the object,

original: sde ni dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: sde ni dbang po rnams so //
translated: the army is the sense faculties,

original: 'di dag gzhig pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mngon par zhen pa ldog pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag gzhig pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mngon par zhen pa ldog pa'o //
translated: and their destruction is the reversal of the clinging to subject and object.

original: de bas na rgyu mtshan de'i phyir rdo rgyus bsgrubs te nam mkha' la 'gro bas na rdo rgyus te mkha' spyod do //
analyzed: de bas na rgyu mtshan de'i phyir rdo rgyus bsgrubs te nam mkha' la 'gro bas na rdo rgyus te mkha' spyod do //
translated: Therefore, for that reason, having accomplished the mercury, one flies through the sky, and so it is called mercury, or sky-farer.

original: de'i sgrub pa bshad de gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sgrub pa bshad de gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: Its accomplishment is explained, and is made clear.

original: rdo rgyus btags nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rgyus btags nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Having applied the mercury,

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi nam mkha' la bde bas spyad pa can gyi chags pa'i mtshan nyid rtog pa med par byas pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi nam mkha' la bde bas spyad pa can gyi chags pa'i mtshan nyid rtog pa med par byas pa'o //
translated: in the space that is the nature of the realm of phenomena, one should make the sign of passion of the one who enjoys bliss, free of conceptualization.

original: bdud rtsi lnga dang ni ye shes lnga dang ngo //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga dang ni ye shes lnga dang ngo //
translated: With the five nectars and the five pristine awarenesses,

original: ku tha ra tstshan na dang lhan cig ces pa ni /
analyzed: ku tha ra tstshan na dang lhan cig ces pa ni /
translated: and together with the kuṭhāra,

original: sta ra ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: sta ra ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: the kuṭhāra is the vajra-holder.

original: gcod pa ni bdag med ma ste tha mi dad pa'o //
analyzed: gcod pa ni bdag med ma ste tha mi dad pa'o //
translated: The cutting is Nairātmya, who is non-different.

original: lhan cig ri lu ni kun la khyab par bya ba'o //
analyzed: lhan cig ri lu ni kun la khyab par bya ba'o //
translated: Together, the pill is to be pervaded everywhere.

original: bya ba ni bya ba'o //
analyzed: bya ba ni bya ba'o //
translated: The action is the activity.

original: sngags ni / aom badzra karta ri he badzr'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa ni /
analyzed: sngags ni / aom badzra karta ri he badzr'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa ni /
translated: The mantra is Oṃ vajra-kuṭhāra, come vajra, hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: aom rdo rje gsum mo //
analyzed: aom rdo rje gsum mo //
translated: Oṃ is the three vajras.

original: badzra ni rdo rje 'dzin no //
analyzed: badzra ni rdo rje 'dzin no //
translated: Vajra is the vajra-holder.

original: karta ri ni bdag med ma'o //
analyzed: karta ri ni bdag med ma'o //
translated: Kartari is Nairatmya.

original: gnyis tha mi dad pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: gnyis tha mi dad pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The non-duality of the two is Hevajra.

original: de yang ye shes 'di yin no //
analyzed: de yang ye shes 'di yin no //
translated: And that is this wisdom.

original: de nyid h'um ngo //
analyzed: de nyid h'um ngo //
translated: That itself is the syllable hum.

original: de nyid sum 'gyur dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de nyid sum 'gyur dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: That itself is the mandala of nine, which is threefold.

original: phat sv'a h'a zhes pa ni /
analyzed: phat sv'a h'a zhes pa ni /
translated: Phaṭ svāhā is

original: ye shes 'di'o //🔽dngos grub kyi don du ni //
analyzed: ye shes 'di'o // dngos grub kyi don du ni //
translated: this wisdom.🔽For the sake of siddhi

original: dngos grub kyi dgos pa'o /
analyzed: dngos grub kyi dgos pa'o /
translated: is the purpose of siddhi.

original: bye ba bzlas zhes bya ba mthar rab tu gsal ba /
analyzed: bye ba bzlas zhes bya ba mthar rab tu gsal ba /
translated: Recite a hundred thousand times is the final clear statement.

original: des na bzlas pa ni gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: des na bzlas pa ni gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par gzhag go //
translated: Therefore, the recitation is established by the method of non-duality.

original: sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas te //
analyzed: sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas te //
translated: Having done a hundred thousand repetitions beforehand

original: zhes pa ni sngon du ni dang por ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sngon du ni dang por ro //
translated: is “before” and “first.”

original: de'i bsnyen pa ni bdag gir byas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bsnyen pa ni bdag gir byas pa'o //
translated: Its repetition is its appropriation.

original: de yang 'bum bzlas pa ni bkag pa ste dang po nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang 'bum bzlas pa ni bkag pa ste dang po nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is a hundred thousand recitations, which is prohibited because it is not generated from the beginning.

original: de zhes pa ni rdo rgyus te mkha' spyod do //
analyzed: de zhes pa ni rdo rgyus te mkha' spyod do //
translated: That is the mortar, which is the celestial realm.

original: bsgrubs la ni bsgrubs pas so //
analyzed: bsgrubs la ni bsgrubs pas so //
translated: Having accomplished is having achieved.

original: ril ba spyi blugs ni bde ba'o //
analyzed: ril ba spyi blugs ni bde ba'o //
translated: The water pot is bliss.

original: 'di'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni ril ba spyi blugs so //
analyzed: 'di'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni ril ba spyi blugs so //
translated: The mandala of its own nature is the water-pot.

original: de'i mgrin pa ni rdo rje'i lte bar ro //
analyzed: de'i mgrin pa ni rdo rje'i lte bar ro //
translated: Its neck is at the center of the vajra.

original: bskor ba ni khyab pa ste rnam par dga' ba la thug par mkha' spyod kyis rgyas btab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bskor ba ni khyab pa ste rnam par dga' ba la thug par mkha' spyod kyis rgyas btab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The circling is the pervasion, up to the climax, because of the seal of the sky-farer.

original: bskor ba ni bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: bskor ba ni bsgom pa'o //
translated: The circling is the meditation.

original: bcag pa ni lta  mo'i padma'i nang du spro ba ste /
analyzed: bcag pa ni lta  mo'i padma'i nang du spro ba ste /
translated: The breaking is the emission into the lotus of the bhaga.

original: de nas lhan cig skyes par shar ba'o //
analyzed: de nas lhan cig skyes par shar ba'o //
translated: Then, the innate arises.

original: dgra thams cad ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dgra thams cad ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags la sogs pa'o //
translated: All enemies are the instincts of the afflictions of passion, aggression, and stupidity, and so forth.

original: mgo med par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don @28a * //
analyzed: mgo med par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don @28a * //
translated: They become headless means that the afflictions become the nature of the realm of reality.

original: to ; / rdo rje gri gug gi cho ga'o //
analyzed: to ; / rdo rje gri gug gi cho ga'o //
translated: This is the procedure of the vajra flaying knife.

original: kun rdzob pa dang don dam pa tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi cho ga'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: kun rdzob pa dang don dam pa tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi cho ga'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The procedure of the gnosis that is not different from the conventional and the ultimate is the meaning.

original: lha rnams dags par 'dod pas thig le bsgrubs te zhes pa ni /
analyzed: lha rnams dags par 'dod pas thig le bsgrubs te zhes pa ni /
translated: The drops are accomplished by the gods who desire the bliss.

original: mu stegs kyi lha bkas pas rnal 'byor pa'i nus mthu chen po yin no //
analyzed: mu stegs kyi lha bkas pas rnal 'byor pa'i nus mthu chen po yin no //
translated: This is a great power of the yogin.

original: de'i don tshangs pa'i sa bon rgyal la bsgrubs nas /
analyzed: de'i don tshangs pa'i sa bon rgyal la bsgrubs nas /
translated: Having accomplished the seed of Brahmā for the king,

original: sta ri gcod pa dang bsres la nyi ma gzas zin pa na mi bskyod pa btags so //
analyzed: sta ri gcod pa dang bsres la nyi ma gzas zin pa na mi bskyod pa btags so //
translated: one should mix it with the cutting of the axe and, when the sun is eclipsed, tie it to Akṣobhya.

original: btags nas dgra sta bya ste /
analyzed: btags nas dgra sta bya ste /
translated: Having tied it, one should make an enemy's foot.🔽Having pressed it with one's foot, one should recite the mantra.

original: de rkang pas mnan nas sngags bzla'o zhes bya ba la tshangs pa'i sa bon ni //
analyzed: de rkang pas mnan nas sngags bzla'o zhes bya ba la tshangs pa'i sa bon ni //
translated: The seed of Brahmā is

original: pa l'a sa'i sa bon no //
analyzed: pa l'a sa'i sa bon no //
translated: the seed of palāśa.

original: rgyal la bsgrubs nas ni rgyu skar rgyal la'o //
analyzed: rgyal la bsgrubs nas ni rgyu skar rgyal la'o //
translated: Having accomplished it for the king, it is for the lunar mansion of Puṣya.

original: sta ri gcod pa dang bsres la nyi ma gzas zin pa na /
analyzed: sta ri gcod pa dang bsres la nyi ma gzas zin pa na /
translated: Having mixed it with the cutting of the axe, when the sun is eclipsed,

original: mi bskyod pa zhes pa ni /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa zhes pa ni /
translated: one should tie it to Akṣobhya.

original: rdo rje'i chu dang btags nas sta ri gcod pa bya ba na bya ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i chu dang btags nas sta ri gcod pa bya ba na bya ba'o //
translated: Having tied it, one should mix it with vajra water and the cutting of the axe.

original: de rkang pas mnan nas sngags bzla'o //
analyzed: de rkang pas mnan nas sngags bzla'o //
translated: Having pressed it with one's foot, one should recite the mantra.

original: aom badzra ku tha ra p'a ta ya p'a ta ya h'um h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra ku tha ra p'a ta ya p'a ta ya h'um h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra kuṭhāra pātaya pātaya hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: sngags 'di bye ba bzlas la thig le byas te /
analyzed: sngags 'di bye ba bzlas la thig le byas te /
translated: Having recited this mantra ten million times, one should make a bindu.

original: phyag bya'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: phyag bya'o zhes pa ni /
translated: One should make obeisance.

original: phyag byas pa ni 'dud pa ste des 'gas so //
analyzed: phyag byas pa ni 'dud pa ste des 'gas so //
translated: The salutation is the bowing, which is done by all.

original: lha dags pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: lha dags pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: This is the rite of worship of the deities.

original: yang na lha rnams mdzes par rol pas na lha rnams te phung po lnga'i bdag nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na lha rnams mdzes par rol pas na lha rnams te phung po lnga'i bdag nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: Or else, the deities are those who delight in the gods, i.e., the Tathagatas who are the five aggregates.

original: de rnams dags par 'dod pas ni /
analyzed: de rnams dags par 'dod pas ni /
translated: By delighting in them,

original: spro ba'i tshul gyis rnam par gzhag par 'dod pas so ;
analyzed: spro ba'i tshul gyis rnam par gzhag par 'dod pas so ;
translated: one should establish oneself in the manner of expansion.

original: til dang 'dra bas na til te rigs gcig dang 'brel pa'i khyad par tha mi dad pa du ma yin no //
analyzed: til dang 'dra bas na til te rigs gcig dang 'brel pa'i khyad par tha mi dad pa du ma yin no //
translated: Sesame is that which is like sesame, i.e., many undifferentiated particularities connected with one kind.

original: de yang don dam pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: de yang don dam pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: And that is the ultimate nature.

original: gnyi ga yang tha mi dad pas 'di thams cad bskyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gnyi ga yang tha mi dad pas 'di thams cad bskyed pa'i phyir /
translated: Since both are undifferentiated, all this is generated.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, that very Vajradhara is to be accomplished.

original: gang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang grub na spro ba dang bsdu ba byed pa nus pa yin no //
analyzed: gang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang grub na spro ba dang bsdu ba byed pa nus pa yin no //
translated: When the state of Vajradhara is accomplished, one is able to emanate and gather.

original: gang spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rang bzhin nyid ni rdo rje 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: gang spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rang bzhin nyid ni rdo rje 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: And that very nature of emanation and gathering is Vajradhara.

original: yang na tshangs pa'i sa bon zhes pa ni /
analyzed: yang na tshangs pa'i sa bon zhes pa ni /
translated: Or else, the “seed of Brahmā” is🔽

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i go 'phang ste /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i go 'phang ste /
translated: Or else, the seed of Brahmā is the state of nirvāṇa.

original: tshangs pa mya ngan 'das sangs rgyas //
analyzed: tshangs pa mya ngan 'das sangs rgyas //
translated: Brahmā is nirvāṇa,

original: zhes pa'o // de'i sa bon ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // de'i sa bon ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: and its seed is nirvāṇa.

original: rgyal la bsgrub pa zhes pa ni rgyal gyi sgras ni rgyas pa ste kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal la bsgrub pa zhes pa ni rgyal gyi sgras ni rgyas pa ste kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: The establishment of the king is the king, which is the term for the extensive, that is, the conventional truth.

original: des bsgrubs pa ni kun rdzob ste mtshan nyid dang bral pa'i don dam pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des bsgrubs pa ni kun rdzob ste mtshan nyid dang bral pa'i don dam pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That which is established by that is the conventional, because the ultimate, which is free from characteristics, does not exist.

original: de nyid sta ri gcod pa dang bsres pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid sta ri gcod pa dang bsres pa ste /
translated: That itself is the axe, which is the cutting.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag med ma tha mi dad pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag med ma tha mi dad pa'o //
translated: Vajradhara is not different from Nairātmya.

original: de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: @28b nyi ma gzas zin pa na ste bdag med pas zin pa'o //
analyzed: @28b nyi ma gzas zin pa na ste bdag med pas zin pa'o //
translated: When the sun is seized, that is, when Nairātmya is seized.

original: mi bskyod pa dang zhes pa ni /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa dang zhes pa ni /
translated: Akṣobhya is

original: btags shing ni gcig tu byas pa'o //
analyzed: btags shing ni gcig tu byas pa'o //
translated: the designation, which is made into one.

original: des dgra sta byas te /
analyzed: des dgra sta byas te /
translated: By that, the enemy is made into an axe,

original: mi shes pa thams cad gcod pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: mi shes pa thams cad gcod pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: because all ignorance is cut by Vajradhara.

original: de byas te ni yang dag bskyod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de byas te ni yang dag bskyod par bya ba'o //
translated: Having done that, one should move properly.

original: de rkang pas ni ye shes kyis so //
analyzed: de rkang pas ni ye shes kyis so //
translated: With the foot of wisdom,

original: mnan nas ni rnam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: mnan nas ni rnam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: having pressed down, one should place.

original: sngags ni ye shes so //
analyzed: sngags ni ye shes so //
translated: The mantra is wisdom.

original: bzlas pa ni bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: bzlas pa ni bskyed pa'o //
translated: The repetition is the generation.

original: aom ni sku'o //
analyzed: aom ni sku'o //
translated: Om is the body.
